texts.en: Manya lives in Yeghvard village, Armenia, with her husband and two sons. She is a director of a local secondary school. Besides her work in the school Manya is involved in agriculture. She keeps colonies of bees, chickens, lambs, and cows, and sells milk and meat. Manya and her husband work hard in order to insure the family's livelihood and secure the future of their sons. She has applied for this loan in order to purchase two cows and feed and improve the herd. The profits from this purchase will help Manya cover daily costs and expand the number of livestock even further in the future.

loans.use: to purchase two cows and feed.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en: Flora, a 52-year-old married mother of two children, one of whom is in school, works very hard to provide for them. For the past four years, Flora has been running a general store in the Philippines selling a variety of items such as sugar, soap and other groceries. Now requesting a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase more goods to sell, in the future she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more store stock to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Febe

texts.en:
Febe is 51 years old and married with four children. Three of her children are in school, and she works very hard to provide for them.

Febe runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell. Febe has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as detergent, diapers and other groceries. 

In the future, Febe would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Norie

texts.en:
Norie wishes to improve her family's income and standard of living as well. She is 56 years old and married and has been blessed with five children. Norie’s husband is a farmer who plants rice in their field within their village. They planted a large crop of rice which is how they generate income.

Norie realizes that her husband's income from farming is not enough to sustain their household expenses. She has been looking for an additional source of income that will help her husband meet their financial responsibilities. In order to achieve this, Norie decided to engage herself in the livestock business. Norie needs financial support to continue operating her business. She is requesting a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy feed for the maintenance of her hogs. Norie believes this loan will help her attain her goals.

loans.use: to buy feed for the maintenance of her hogs.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
“In every sacrifice there is a gift": this is what Rebecca believes. Every day she is very optimistic that she can receive a gift through her business. Rebecca is 53 years old and married to Euligio. They live in the province of Isabela and they are blessed with three children. Rebecca is a vendor in their village. She sells a variety of food products in order to earn a living. Some of her products include: vegetables, fish sauce, goto (congee), and halo-halo during summer in her little stall located near their house. 

Rebecca would like to request a loan in the amount of 15,000 Philippine Pesos to be used as additional working capital for her business. She has always been busy with her efforts to earn a living. She wishes that somehow, someday, they can uplift their poor living condition so that her children and future families will not suffer so much from life's difficulties.

loans.use: to buy spices and ingredients for her business.

loans.name: William Alfredo

texts.es:
William, necesita seguir invirtiendo en el negocio de reparación de bicicletas, quiere comprar un nuevo pedido de repuestos para el taller como cadenas, fricciones, partes para bicicletas como asientos, maniubros, Pedales, entre otros accesorios que son necesarios para dar un buen servicio al cliente.

El préstamo anterior le permitió crecer en el negocio, le ayudó también a mejorar sus ventas, incrementó el número de clientes, su condición económica ha mejorado ya que tiene más clientes en la zona.
texts.en:
William needs to continue to invest in his bicycle repair business. He wants to buy a new order of parts for the workshop, such as chains, breaks, and bike parts such as seats, handlebars, pedals, and other accessories that are necessary in order to provide good customer service.
His previous loan allowed him to expand his business. It also helped him to improve his sales. His number of local clients increased and this has resulted in an improvement in his economic situation.

loans.use: to buy chains, brakes, seats, handlebars, and pedals.

loans.name: Helena Emperatriz

texts.es:
Helena, quiere surtir el negocio, por eso solicita un nuevo préstamo para aumentar la venta de enchape,  de ropa nueva y productos de revistas, comprándose lociones, cremas, aretes, prendas de vestir, en la compra espera que le de buenos resultados para aumentar sus ganancias.

Con el préstamo anterior tuvo un efecto positivo, ya que surtio el negocio de venta enchape y productos de revistas, en su familia se ha mantenido sus condiciones; hoy en día se encuentra ofreciendo la venta de ropa nueva y su deseo es continuar aumentando la inversión.
texts.en: Helena wants to re-supply her shop, which is why she asks for a new loan in order to increase her sales of plated jewellery, new clothing and products from catalogues. She will buy lotions, creams, earrings, and clothes. She hopes these purchases will sell well and help her increase her income. The previous loan was very successful in this regard, as she was able to start selling plated jewellery and products from catalogues. Her family's needs are still the same. Helena wants to keep investing in her business and to start selling new clothing.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and clothes to sell.

loans.name: Jose Rafael

texts.es: El Sr. Jose, tiene 55 años de edad, está soltero vive con sus hijos en una Colonia suburbana de San Pedro Sula.  El siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, hace 15 años logro conseguir un puesto de venta en un mercado de la Ciudad en donde alquila. Vende frutas como sandias, mandarinas y principalmente piña. El compra las frutas al por mayor directamente del productor y las vende al detalle en el mercado. Don Jose ha decidido solicitar este préstamo que es por 20,000 Lempiras para abastecerse de fruta de piña para la venta. El ya tiene sus clientes fijos con su negocio y este préstamo le ayudara mantener siempre producto y obtener ganancias para la manutención de su familia. Tiene como meta lograr tener un local propio para  mejorar el negocio.
texts.en:
Jose is 55 years old and single.  He lives with his children in a suburban neighborhood in San Pedro Sula.  He has always been a merchant, and 15 years ago he managed to get his own sales stand, which he rents, at a city market.  He sells fruit like watermelons, tangerines, and he mainly sells pineapples.  He buys the fruit wholesale directly from the producer, and he sells it for retail at the market.

Jose has decided to request this loan for 20,000 lempiras in order to stock up on pineapples to sell.  He already has his fixed customers with his business.  This loan will help him to always have the product and to get income to support his family.  His goal is to manage to have his own place in order to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy pineapples to sell.

loans.name: Carola

texts.es:
Carola, de 45 es una mujer sencilla.  Vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 3 hijos a los cuida en su casa propia. Desde hace 16 años abrió una tienda de abarrotes en su misma casa, recibe la ayuda de sus hijos constantemente en la atención a sus clientes,  mientras ella realiza las compras o sale por algún asunto. Su tienda esta abierta todos los días incluyendo los domingos y por las mañanas lo que más vende son panes y  alimentos para el desayuno que le permite mejorar sus ventas, esto la anima a continuar adelante por lo que su deseo es seguir mejorando su tienda de abarrotes. Este es el único negocio que posee, pero en los primeros días del mes de noviembre, vende comida y todo tipo de bebidas en el cementerio de su localidad, donde los pobladores visitan a sus familiares que fallecieron, por esa razón desea este apoyo económico, ya que en esta temporada se obtiene buenas ganancias y no desea desaprovechar la oportunidad. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, espera de un pequeño préstamo para lograr sus objetivos y mejoras en su negocio. Además promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, pues le agrada ser parte de su asociación.
Carola, invertirá el dinero en la compra de bebidas de toda variedad, además de productos de primera necesidad para la preparación de los alimentos.
texts.en: Carola, who is 45, is a simple woman. She lives with her husband and their three children, whom she raises in the house they own. Sixteen years ago, she opened a grocery shop in her house and has been tending to it since, with the help of her children, who attend customers when she needs to buy supplies or has business in town. Carola's shop is open every day, including Sundays. In the morning, she sells mostly bread or breakfast fare, which is very good for business. This encourages her to think brightly of the future, and her wish is to keep improving her business. It is the only shop she owns, but she has taken to selling food and all manner of beverages in the cemetery for All Saints', when people visit the graves of their loved ones. This is why she asks for this loan, so as not to lose such a good opportunity for business. It is her third loan with field partner MFP, and she hopes this small sum will help her reach her goal and improve her business. She promises to be punctual with her repayments, because she is very happy being a part of her communal bank. Carola will use the loan to buy all manner of drinks as well as the necessary ingredients to make the food she sells.

loans.use: to buy all manner of drinks as well as the necessary ingredients to make the food she sells.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for the pigs.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 37 years old and married with five children.

Julieta works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 17,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more grocery items to sell.

Julieta has been in this business for 3 years and has previously received funds through Kiva. She aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Yeny

texts.es:
Yeny, de 31 años es una hija ejemplar vive en compañía de sus padres y 3 hermanos a los que apoya en casa de su madre, donde ella vive. Cuando apenas terminó el colegio estudio la carrera de Ingeniería de sistemas, a petición de sus padres, confiesa que nunca le gusto, por ello no ejerció la profesión. Y comenzó a generar ingresos en el negocio de compra y venta de ropa y productos de belleza, que instaló en su casa. Al principio le constó mucho conseguir clientes, ofrecía de casa en casa su mercadería, con el tiempo y gracias a su esfuerzo ya tenía clientes conocidas, quienes la buscaban y hacían pedidos, Ahora tiene cuenta con numerosos pedidos de uniformes. Le va muy bien; que decidió estudiar la carrera que siempre le gustó “Ingeniería Civil”, le falta un año para terminarla y ya trabaja en la gobernación de su localidad, como supervisora de obras y gracias a su capacidad, hace poco un grupo de Arquitectos le solicitaron, que forme parte de su proyecto de construcción, donde obtendrá buenas ganancias mientras que dure el proyecto. Se siente feliz y tiene muchos planes de especialización, “mi camino todavía comienza, quiero especializarme en carreteras”, afirma.  Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, espera de un pequeño préstamo para lograr sus objetivos y mejoras en su negocio. Además promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, pues le agrada ser parte de su asociación.
Yeny, invertirá el dinero en la compra de ropa variada para la temporada navideña. Pues ya tiene pedidos.
texts.en:
Yeny, age 31, is an exemplary daughter. She lives with her parents and three siblings, whom she supports. She studied systems engineering right out of school at her parents' urging. She confesses that she never enjoyed it, so she does not work in that field. She started a business selling clothing and beauty products from her home. In the beginning, it was very difficult to get clients. She offered her merchandise door-to-door. With time, thanks to her hard work, she has built up a customer base. Her customers seek her out and make orders. She now has a large uniform order. Now that things are going very well for her, she has decided to study a career that she has always loved: civil engineering. She has one year left and she is already working for the local government as a work supervisor. Thanks to her abilities, a group of architects has recently asked her to be part of their construction project. She will make a good income for the duration of the project. She is very happy and has many plans for specialization; "my journey is still beginning. I want to specialize in roads," she confirms. This is her second loan with MFP. She hopes to receive a small loan in order to obtain her goals and improve her business. She promises to be punctual in paying her quotas; she likes being part of this group.
Yeny will invest this loan in the purchase of varied clothing for the Christmas season. She already has orders.

loans.use: To buy varied modern clothing.

loans.name: Concepcion De Maria

texts.es: Concepción de María de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo; ella posee una venta de ropa camisas, pantalones, vestidos  para damas, caballeros y niños, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas y eso le ayuda a obtener las mejores ganancias; comercia desde su vivienda y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Concepción es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan estar un paso mas cerca del éxito y no se rendirá hasta lograrlo por completo; en las ultimas semanas  aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa  por mayor. Concepción María tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Concepción is forty-five years old and lives with her partner and their son. She sells clothes for men, women, and children (shirts, trousers, dresses) and is very experienced, which helps her have a good income. She operates from her house and has many returning customers, who like the quality of her products, the good prices she offers and the excellent customer service she provides. Concepción is a hard-working woman, very keen, who wants above all to improve her lot in life. She is always watching for new opportunities that could help her improve her business. She will not give up until she is successful. Demand has been steadily rising these past few weeks, so she is asking field partner INTEGRAL for a loan in order to invest smartly by buying clothes wholesale. Concepción has a good credit history and impeccable morals. She says she will be able to repay the debt and she is confident that she will make her family's life a lot better.

loans.use: to buy clothes wholesale.

loans.name: Lourdelyn

texts.en:
Lourdelyn is a 39-year-old married woman from Maribojoc, Bohol. She has four children. The oldest child is thirteen while the youngest is seven. 

She owns a sari-sari (variety) store business. She sells items like canned goods, shampoo, pouch soy sauce, vinegar, and cooking oil. Lourdelyn has been in the sari-sari store business for 6 years. She earns three thousand pesos a month from the sari-sari store. 

She requested a loan of 4,000 PHP to purchase additional merchandise to sell like soft drinks, toiletries, canned goods, and soy sauce. In the future, Lourdelyn would like to invest in other business ventures to support her family and to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like soft drink, toiletries, canned goods, and soy sauce.

loans.name: José

texts.es: Desde los 10 años José aprendió a trabajar con su abuelo paterno en las fincas de café cosechando y a los 20 años compro sus primeras tierras y  comenzó a producir su propio café. Posteriormente a la edad de 22 años contrajo matrimonio dedicándose   él y su esposa a la siembra y cultivo de café procrearon 4   hijos que los ayudaban en las labores del café, al fallecer su esposa y casándose sus hijos José tuvo que hacerse cargo de todas las labores que conlleva el cuidado y producción del café, actualmente cuenta con 4 hectáreas de siembra que le producen unas 8 toneladas por cosecha queriendo aumentar este resultado José pide un  crédito para compra de fertilizantes que le ayudaran a que sus plantas produzcan mas café y también necesita para realizar las labores culturales que son el chapeo que le ayudara a mantener limpia su parcela para así poder facilitar el acceso a los cortadores  y posteriormente después del corte de café para realizar las labores de poda que lo ayudaran a quitar las ramas excedentes de la palta de café. Él sabe que empleando bien el crédito obtendrá mayores resultados reflejados en su próxima cosecha.
texts.en: From the age of ten, José was learning to work with his paternal grandfather, harvesting coffee. At the age of 20 he bought his first lands and started to produce his own coffee. Later, at the age of 22, he got married. He and his wife have worked together to sow and reap coffee. Together they have four children who have helped them with the work on the plantations. Since his wife passed away and his children got married, José has had to take on all the work of coffee production himself. He currently has four hectares which he sows, producing 8 tonnes in the harvest. He wants to increase this amount, so he is requesting a loan for the purchase of fertilizers to help his plants produce more coffee. He also needs to perform standard labour to keep his plots clean and facilitate access to the cutters. After cutting the coffee, he will also need money for the labour to help him remove the excess branches from the coffee. He knows that if he uses this loan well, he will get better results in his next harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and clean up his coffee plantations.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es: José Luis tiene  45 años de edad casado con 2 menores hijos vive en casa propio desde muy pequeño José Luis fue enseñado por su padre a cultivar y producir café. A partir de que José Luis se caso con Margarita compraron su parcela y los dos emprendieron  el oficio del café utilizando todos los conocimientos que su padre le había enseñado, trabajando duro en su parcela José Luis pudo comprar mas terreno para sembrar actualmente cuenta con 3 hectáreas de siembra y queriendo aumentar sus tierras y su producción José pide un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes que le ayudaran a aumentar su producción y para la compra de planta nueva para reforestar una parte de su parcela, él sabe que fertilizando y reforestando en un poco tiempo obtendrá mayor cosecha y mejores resultados que con ello le ayudara a mejorar su calidad de vida y a cumplir su meta que es la de apoyar a sus hijos a que terminen una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
José Luis is 45 years old and is married with two young children. He lives in his own home. 

Since José Luis was very young his father taught him to cultivate and produce coffee. Since José Luis married Margarita they bought a plot and the two undertook the trade of coffee using all of the knowledge that his father taught him. Working hard in his plot, José Luis was able to purchase more land to sow. 

Currently, he counts on three acres to sow. Wanting to increase his land and his production, José Luis is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizers that will help me to increase his production and to purchase new plants to reforest part of his plot.  He knows that fertilizing and reforesting in a little time will yield major crops and better results with which it will help him to improve the quality of his life and accomplish the goal to help his children to finish their college careers.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and coffee plants

loans.name: Francisca Del Carmen

texts.es: Francisca del Carmen de cincuenta y seis años de edad vive junto a sus hijos; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, las personas la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Francisca es una mujer dedicada a su labor, enérgica y con muchas metas por delante, su mas grande secreto para alcanzar el éxito es la constancia y el amor al trabajo sabe que solo así logrará lo que desea, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. Francisca del Carmen tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Francisca del Carmen, 56, lives with her children.  She has a store where she sells basic consumer products such as: beans, milk, eggs, bread, and other items. She's had this business for many years, and this has given her sales experience which allows her to obtain the best earnings.  Her business is located in her house, and it is in a very busy place so she gets a lot of customers.  People prefer her business because she always has the products they need.  She offers good quality products at affordable prices, and offers unparalleled service as she is always at the call of her customers.  

Francisca is a woman who is devoted to her work.  She is energetic,and has a lot of goals in front of her.  Her secret to success is her unwavering effort and love of her work. She knows that only in this way will she achieve what she desires.  As all good merchants, she wants to grow her business and make an new investment.  However, she lacks the capital to do this.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy staple consumer products, snacks, eggs, bread, drinks, etc.  

Francisca del Carmen has good credit references, and she is certain that she will pay off the debt.  At the same time, she trusts that this will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy staple consumer products, snacks, eggs, bread, and drinks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To construct a zero-grazing unit and buy a power generator.

loans.name: Milena

texts.es: Milena, de 33 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Antonio, su esposo desde hace 12 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Daniel y Oder; a los que cuida en su casa propia.Desde niña vivió junto a los campos agrícolas, sus padres le enseñaron todo lo que hoy sabe del campo. Posee terrenos agrícolas propios donde siembra verduras, hortalizas y demás alimentos de primera necesidad, cuida mucho de sus cultivos, sobre todo porque aprendió a sembrar de manera orgánica como lo realizaban antes sus abuelos, eso le brinda sembríos de alta calidad y gracias a ello obtiene buenas ganancias, ahora desea seguir mejorando la calidad de sus alimentos. Sabe que lo conseguirá pues es una mujer luchadora. Además de recibir el apoyo de su esposo quien trabaja como albañil, construyendo diversas casas. Ahora concentra toda su energía en mejorar sus ingresos económicos para poder mejorar la condición de vida de sus hijos.  Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Manos fuertes” y este es el crédito número 3 con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda económica para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Milena; invertirá el dinero en la compra de anono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Milena is 33 years old and is a hard working woman. She lives in the company of Antonio, her husband of 12 years. Both have 2 children, Daniel and Oder, who they take care of in their own home.  

Since she was a young girl she lived near the agricultural fields. Her parents taught her everything that she now knows about the field. She possesses her own agricultural areas where sows vegetables and other basic need products. She takes good care of her crops, mostly because she learned to sow organically the way it was done before her grandparents. This yields high quality crops, thanks to which she has good earnings. 

Now she hopes to continue to improve the quality of her food. She knows that she will achieve this because she is hardworking. Also, she receives the support of her husband who works as a construction worker; he builds a variety of houses. 

Now she concentrates all her energy to improve her income to improve the quality of life of her children. This is her third loan. She is part of the solidarity group “Manos Fuertes” (Strong Hands) where she feels developed because of the financial help to progress her business. She promises to be punctual in her payments. Milena will invest the money in the purchase of organic manure to nourish her crops.

loans.use: to purchase organic manure

loans.name: Ivania Elizabeth

texts.es:
Ivania tiene 21 anos de edad, casada, vive en la ciudad de Granada, casada, de oficio comerciante; es dueña de una pulpería y se dedica a vender granos básicos, ya que inicio con un dinero que recogió de ingreso de salario como agente vendedora de un negocio que tiene su papa. 
Ivania  quiere diversificarse más en productos para su pulpería pues su expectativa es mantener su negocio activo para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Solicita el crédito para comprar granos básicos. Toda la mercadería necesaria para surtir su pulpería, el cual estima será de ayuda pues podrá invertir en su negocio en la compra de productos mas solicitados por los clientes, sus planes futuros es ampliar el área del negocio para mayor atracción de clientes con el objetivo de obtener mejores ingresos, su meta próximas es hacerle mejora a su casa para tener mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Ivania is 21 years old, married, and lives in the city of Granada.  Her job is that of shopkeeper; she is the owner of a small grocery store and she sells staple grains for a living.  She started out with money saved from the salary she earned as a salesperson at her father's business.

Ivania wants to have a greater diversity of products in her grocery store as she hopes to keep her business active so she can meet her customers' needs.  She is asking for this loan to buy staple grains and all the merchandise she needs to stock her grocery store.  She believes this will be helpful because it will allow her to invest in her business by buying the products most requested by her customers.  Her plans for the future are to expand her business to attract more customers so that she can make more profits.  Her next goal is to make improvements to her home so that she can have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy staple grains

loans.name: Adrian Antonio

texts.es:
El joven Adrián  de 24 años de edad, vive con sus padres, tiene un hijo que depende de el, Adrián vive en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 03 años a su negocio venta de ropa nueva y calzado para damas y caballeros, también tiene un microbús para transportar estudiantes, que es otro ingreso que el  genera, Su venta la realiza un local ubicado en el mercado nuevo de San Lorenzo. El Joven Adrián es una persona emprendedora y con deseos de salir adelante.
Adrián esta solicitando 20,000.00 lempiras para la compra de pantalones, camisas, suéter, Shorts, pijamas, faldas, calcetines, camisas de niño,  lencerías  y zapatos. Ya que se acerca la navidad  y el  desea surtir su negocio para atender mejor a sus clientes.
Adrián con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende suplir la necesidad de financiamiento para surtir su negocio y tener mejores ganancias que ayuden a mejorar su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Adrián es tener su casa propia y  otro bus.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre  del 2012.
texts.en:
The young man Adrián is 24 years old. He lives with his parents. He has a son that depends on him. Adrián lives in the community of San Lorenzo,  in the south of Honduras. He has worked for the last three years in his business that sells new clothing and footwear for ladies and gentleman. He also has a small school bus, which is another income that he earns. 

He sells in a store located in the new market of San Lorenzo. The young man Adrián is an enterprising person with a desire to get ahead. Adrián is requesting 20,000 lempiras to purchase pants, shirts, sweaters, shorts, pajamas, skirts, socks, boys shirts, lines and shoes. 

Since Christmas is approaching, he wants to supply his business to better attend to his clients. Adrián, with the help of the loan, will supply his business financially and have better earnings that will help the quality of his life. The dream of Adrián is to have his own home and another bus. San Lorenzo, Honduras. October 2012.

loans.use: to purchase pants, shirts, sweaters, shorts, pajamas, skirts, socks, boys shirts, lines and shoes for his business

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
This is Virginia, 47, resident of Manila, Philippines. She is married to Pablo, a driver, and mother to her children. She and her husband manage their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Virginia operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, 5 pesos worth of cooking oil or an egg. She earns by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 Philippine pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, Virginia is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan. She will be using the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Virginia hopes to give her children a good and quality education and dreams of having a good life through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week. This is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Damiano

texts.es: Damiano   de 57 años de edad  aprendio desde muy pequeño al lado de sus padres y hermanos a trabajar en las fincas aprendiendo todo lo relacionado con el café, desde sembrarlo, cosecharlo, procesarlo y hasta buscar clientes para su colocación en el mercado. El café que Damiano  produce es orgánico ya que el fertilizante que utiliza el mismo lo prepara y no utiliza productos químicos para ello. Damiano es socio de la “Unión Regional Huatusco” y esta organización lo apoya con planta de café y abono orgánico. Para las labores que se requieren en su cafetal Damiano contrata personal para que lo ayuden, contribuyendo así a la economía de estas personas y su familia. Dentro de sus cafetales tiene sembrados algunos árboles frutales que le sirven para dar sombra a la planta de café. Para la próxima cosecha él necesita sembrar nuevas plantas pues cuenta con media hectárea en su finca que esta sin sembrar y también necesita hacer labores culturales de limpieza y conservación de la tierra y por eso el necesita de un crédito. Él sabe que empleando el crédito como lo a planeado lograra obtener mejor cosecha y con ello una mayor ganancia económica que se vera reflejada en el mejoramiento de su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Fifty-seven-year-old Damiano learned to work in the fields at his father's and brothers' sides when he was very young.  He learned everything about coffee, from sowing it to harvesting it to processing it and even how to find customers for his market stall.  The coffee Damian grows is organic, as he makes his own fertilizers and does not use chemical products in it.  Damiano is a member of the Unión Regional Huatusco and this organization helps him with coffee plants and organic fertilizers.  Damiano hires personnel to help him with labor on his coffee plantation and so he contributes to the finances of these people and their families.  Throughout his coffee plantation he has planted some fruit trees that provide shade for the coffee plants.  For his next harvest he needs to plant more because there is half a hectare on his coffee plantation that hasn't been sown.  He also needs to do cultural cleaning and conservation work on his land, which is why he needs this loan.  He knows that he will have a better harvest is he uses the loan as he has planned and this will make him better earnings, which will in turn be reflected in the improvement of his quality of life.

loans.use: to plant coffee

loans.name: Zina

texts.en: Zina lives with her husband, Muraz, in Kapan town. She works at the local school and helps her husband with agriculture. They keep cows and calves and sell milk and meat products. The couple has applied for this loan in order to purchase two cows and a calf. This will help them to cover their basic needs and to gather more income. Zina and her husband plan to improve their held with special milk cows in the future, and this loan will help them to implement this goal.

loans.use: to purchase two cows and a calf

loans.name: Luís Iban

texts.es:
Él se ha dedicado a la agricultura; pero desde hace 10 años aprendió el oficio de la albañilería y posee su casa gracias  a los créditos otorgados por la Fundación Campo. 

Don Luís desea instalar una granja de pollos de engorde, para cumplir este objetivo necesita construir una galera y por ese motivo esta solicitando un préstamo para comprar 300 bloques, 6 bolsas de cemento, medio flete de cuartones de madera, 24 yardas de maya ciclón, pollos, concentrado, vacunas, vitaminas, lamina para el techo y para pago de mano de obra. Él comenta que se acerca la época navideña en la cual espera obtener muy buenas ganancias, que le permitan ahorrar para mejorar su calidad de vida. Pretende continuar trabajando en las milpas frijoleras, con la granja de pollos y gallinas, trabajar como albañil, además de continuar brindando el servicio con su molino de nixtamal. Todo lo hace con el firme propósito de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, lograr que su hijo estudie y sea un buen profesional.
texts.en:
He works in agriculture. However, 10 years ago he learned how to do building work, and now has a house thanks to the loans he received from Fundación Campo. 

Luís wants to establish a broiler chicken farm. In order to do this, he needs to build a chicken coop. This is why he is requesting a loan, so that he can purchase 300 blocks, 6 bags of cement, half a load of construction timber, 24 yards of chicken wire, chickens, feed, vaccines, vitamins, roofing materials, and to pay for labour. He says that Christmas is coming and he hopes to earn a very good profit during this time. The money he earns will enable him to save and in this way improve his quality of life. 

His aim is to continue working the bean fields and his chicken and hen farm. He will also continue to do building work and to provide a nixtamal milling service. He does all this with the clear intention of improving his family's quality of life, and to ensure that his son studies and becomes a good professional.

loans.use: to buy 300 blocks, 6 bags of cement, half a load of construction timber, 24 yards of chicken wire, chickens, feed, vaccines, vitamins, roofing materials, and to pay for labour.

loans.name: Mario Jose

texts.es:
Mario de 60 anos de edad vive en la ciudad de Granada; acompañado, de oficio carpintero. Se dedica desde muy joven a la elaboración de sillas, comedores, mesas, roperos, gabinetes, tiene más de 20 años de experiencia.  
Solicita este crédito para comprar materia prima tales como pintura, lijas, barniz, madera, pegamento, etc. El desea hacer crecer su negocio que ha soñado desde pequeño el cual su padre se lo heredo. Además de ser  un hombre que se dedica a la carpintería tiene otro negocio que es vender huevo y gaseosa en su casa y con el tiempo  le gustaría poder dar empleo a otras personas
texts.en:
Mario is 60 years old and lives in the city of Granada.  He lives with his partner, and is a carpenter by trade. From a very young age he has worked making chairs, dining room furniture, tables, wardrobes and cabinets. He has more than 20 years of experience.

He is applying for this loan in order to buy materials, such as paint, sandpaper, varnish, wood, glue, etc. He wishes to make his business grow, which he has dreamed about doing since he was small. This is a business that he inherited it from his father.  

In addition to his carpentry, he has another business, which is selling eggs and soft drinks in his home. In time, he would like to be able to employ other people.

loans.use: To buy paint, sandpaper, varnish, wood and glue.

loans.name: Dora Estela

texts.es: Dora Estela de treinta y tres  años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de tamales de gallina y pollo, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en la preparación,  gracias a eso obtiene las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su hogar y de forma ambulante, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de un buen servicio; Dora es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y con muchas metas que desea lograr, quiere ganarse un futuro mas prospero y trabajara duro hasta alcanzar el éxito que tanto desea, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, carnes, verduras, hojas, etc. Dora Estela tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, se siente muy contenta con la ayuda que le brindan, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Thirty-three-year-old Dora Estela lives with her life partner and her son in her own home.  She sells chicken tamales for a living.  She has had her business for several years and she has a lot of experience in cooking, thanks to which she has made more profit.  She sells from her home and on foot.  She now has a large clientele, as people prefer her because everything she sells is of the highest quality at reasonable prices and with good service.  Dora is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work and who has many goals she wants to achieve.  She wants to earn herself a more prosperous future and she will work until she achieves the success she wants so dearly.  Her demand has gone up in the past few weeks and she wants to take advantage of this to make a new investment, which is why she is applying for a loan with INTEGRAL to buy corn, meat, vegetables, leaves, etc.  Dora Estela has good credit references and impeccable morals.  She is very happy with the help she has been offered and she assures that she will repay her debt.  She is confident that she will give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn, meat, vegetables, leaves

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a video camera for the photography business of her youngest son.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de siembra esta ubicado en un lugar de alto potencial agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque todo el producto es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de un excelente servicio; Santos es un hombre entregado a su labor y luchador, día a día se esfuerza por salir adelante sabe que solo con esfuerzo y constancia logrará  el éxito que tanto desea, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aprovechar y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, insecticida, etc. Santos tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Santos is 36-years-old and lives with his partner of life and his sons in their own home. He works in agriculture, specifically, in the cultivation of corn and beans. He has been working several years, which has given him a lot of experience that has allowed him to obtain the best crops. The land for sowing is located in a place of high agricultural potential. He trades in all of the surrounding community.  He has lots of clients because people prefer him because his products are of the best quality. Besides his excellent service, he offers accessible prices. 

Santos is a man committed to his job that every day tries very hard to get ahead. He knows only with effort and consistency he will achieve the success that he desires so much. In this new sowing season he wants to make a new investment, but he needs capital. For this reason he is requesting a loan to allow him to purchase corn seeds, beans, manure, insecticide, etc. Santos has good credit references. He is confident that he will be able to repay the loan and at the same time give his family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase seeds for corn, beans, manure and insecticide

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.en:
Bonifacia is a 59-year-old rice farmer from San Jose, Talibon, Bohol. She has been in the rice farming business for more than 20 years. In addition to rice farming, Bonifacia is engaged in a hog raising business. These are the sources of her income.

Bonifacia is in need of additional capital for her business. She is requesting a loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for the rice, and additional feed for the pigs.

Bonifacia hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for the rice field, and feed for pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Wilfredi

texts.es: Wilfredi vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de güisquil, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y ha adquirido valiosa experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde cultiva tiene un alto potencial agrícola, esta apto para la siembra y muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad de producto, los buenos precios pero sobre todo por el excelente servicio siempre a la disposición de los clientes; Wilfredi es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, se dedica con gran esfuerzo y dedicación a su labor esta seguro que solo así logará el éxito que tanto desea; en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas debido a los cambios de clima y quiere recuperarse pero para ello necesita de capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de güisquil, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Wilfredi tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos y se siente muy contento con la ayuda que le ha sido aportada, se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Wilfredi lives with his life partner and their children in their own home.  He grows chayote for a living.  He has been working in farming for several years and he has acquired valuable experience, which enables him to reap good harvests.  The land where he plants has high farming potential; it is ripe for planting and it is very close to his home.  He sells in all the areas around his community and he has a lot of customers who prefer him because of the quality of his produce, his good prices, and above all his excellent customer service, which is always at his customers' disposal.  Wilfredi is an enterprising man with a great desire to get ahead.  He applies himself to his work with intense effort and dedication.  He is certain that that is the only way to achieve the success he wants so dearly.  During the past growing season he suffered some losses because of weather changes and he wants to make up for them, but in order to do that he needs capital to support him.  This is why he is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy chayote seed, insecticide, herbicide, etc.  Wilfredi has good credit references among those who know him and he is very happy with the help he has received.  He will be responsible in repaying his debt and, at the same time, he hopes that it will give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy chayote seed, insecticide, herbicide

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: Alejandro  desde pequeño ayudaba a sus padres y hermanos a cortar café en las fincas. Actualmente tiene 40 años de edad, está casado con Ofelia y junto con ella y sus 2 hijos Se dedican a la producción de café. Cuando no hay mucho trabajo que realizar en sus cultivos Alejandro y su esposa se dedican a trabajar en su cría de borregos que es su sostén mientras llega la cosecha se café  y de esta manera logran salir adelante. Durante la última cosecha Alejandro  tuvo una producción de 3 toneladas debido a que sus fincas necesitan ser renovadas pues mucha de la planta que tiene ya es antigua y no tiene un buen rendimiento, además que tiene espacio suficiente para sembrar más plantas sin afectar la calidad del café. Todo este proceso le tomará a Alejandro  aproximadamente 3 años y para ello el necesita un crédito para compra de planta nueva y para el pago de limpieza de su finca lo cual vera reflejado en una mayor cosecha y mayor ganancia económica. Alejandro  y su esposa  trabajan muy duro porque su mayor ilusión es que sus hijos tengan la oportunidad de estudiar, pues la comunidad en la que ellos viven es muy pequeña, hay pocas oportunidades de trabajo y es necesario salir para poder prepararse mejor.
texts.en:
Since he was a little boy Alejandro used to help his parents and brothers to harvest coffee on the plantation. He is now 40-years-old and he is married to Ofelia. Together with his wife and children they work in the production of coffee.  When there is not much work to do for his crops, Alejandro and his wife work to raise sheep, which is their livelihood while they wait for the coffee harvest.  In this manner they are able to get ahead. 

During the last harvest Alejandro had a harvest of 3 tons of coffee. He needs financing to renew his plants because they are old and do not produce enough coffee. Additionally, he has enough space to plant more crops without affecting the quality of the coffee. This entire process will take Alejandro about 3 years. For this he needs a loan to purchase new plants and he will need to clear the land to produce a larger harvest and larger financial gain. 

Alejandro and his wife work very hard because their biggest dream is that their children have the opportunity to study. Since the community where they live is very small, there are very few job opportunities and it is necessary to leave to be better prepared.

loans.use: to purchase coffee plants and clear his land

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Don Santos  ha dedicado su vida a trabajar en el campo pues cuando era niño ayudaba a su padre a trabajar en las fincas de café y con el ganado. Cuando Don Santos  se casó con Ana Delia  a la edad de 20 años trabajaba como Taxista en su comunidad, alternando esta actividad con la producción de su café, siendo esta actualmente su única fuente de ingresos para él y su esposa. Ellos tienen hijos que ya están casados, pero durante la época de cosecha los ayudan pues hay demasiado trabajo.  Don Santos  necesita un crédito, pues tiene que comprar planta de café para renovar sus fincas y también debe hacer labores de limpieza para que el producto de mejores frutos. Una de las satisfacciones más grandes de Don Santos es haberle podido dar a sus hijos terrenos para que ellos los trabajen ahora que ya están casados y enseñen a su hijos la tradición familiar que es la de cultivar y producir café.
texts.en:
Santos has dedicated his life to work in the fields. When he was a boy he used to help his father work on the coffee harvest and the cattle. When Santos was married with Ana Della at the age of 20, he worked as a taxi driver in his community. He alternated this activity with the production of coffee, which was his only strong source of income for himself and his wife. 

They now have grown children that are married, but during the harvesting time the children help them because there is a lot of work to do. Santos needs a loan because he needs to renew coffee plants on his plantation and he needs to clear the land so plant bears a better product. One of the greatest satisfactions of Santos is to have been able to give land to his children so they in turn work the land now that they are married and they teach their own children the family tradition of growing coffee.

loans.use: to purchase coffee plants and clear the land

loans.name: Ivania Patricia

texts.es:
La Señora Ivania Patricia tiene un negocio de venta de productos populares o de primera necesidad ubicado en unos de los mercados  del departamento de León desde hace 23 años, sale de su casa a las 7:00 am y abre su negocio a las 7:30 am cerrándolo a 5 pm. realiza este Trabajo para el sustento de su familia. 

Doña Ivania Patricia utilizara este crédito para comprar por mayor  grano básico tales  como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, de esa manera le permitirá   vender a precios más bajos  y así   lograr  a tener mayor clientela. 

Doña Ivania  está solicitando crédito a Ceprodel para incrementar su inventario con productos de mejor calidad y lograr   mayor venta donde obtendrá más ganancia y así tener un mejor nivel de vida de ella y su familia, ella sueña con la formación profesional de sus tres hijas.
texts.en:
Ms. Ivania Patricia has a retail shop selling basic staples and other popular products located in one of the markets of Leon Department which she has done for 23 years. She leaves home at 7 a.m. and opens for business at 7:30 a.m., closing at 5 p.m. She does this work to support her family. 

Ms. Ivania Patricia will use this loan to purchase basic staples wholesale, such as rice, beans, sugar and oil, which will allow her to sell them at lower prices and so reach a larger number of customers. 

Ms. Ivania  is seeking a loan from Ceprodel to increase her inventory with higher quality products and achieve better sales by which to make more profits. Thus she and her family may have a better quality of life. She dreams that her three daughters may receive professional education and training.

loans.use: to purchase basic staples such as rice, beans, sugar and oil.

loans.name: Lucrecia Miriam

texts.es:
La Señora Lucrecia Miriam tiene un negocio de venta de Electrodomésticos  ubicado en el centro  de la ciudad de león desde hace 20  años, sale de su casa a las 7:30 am y abre su negocio a la 8:am cerrándolo a la 6:00 pm  siendo este trabajo el sustento de su familia.

 La señora Lucrecia Miriam utilizara este crédito para cancelar un pedido de juguetes, radio, Televisores. Abanicos, arreglos navideños, debido a que aumentado la demanda por  aproximarse  la navidad. 

Doña Lucrecia se acercó a Ceprodel a solicitar  apoyo con un crédito para incrementar su inventario de mejor calidad para satisfacer a su  clientela, así obteniendo mayores ingresos y mejorar el nivel de vida tanto de ella como de su familia. 

Los sueños de Doña Lucrecia es ayudar a su Hija  a instalar su laboratorio clínico.
texts.en:
Ms. Lucrecia Miriam has a retail business selling household appliances located in the downtown area of the city of Leon which she has had for 20 years. She leaves home at 7:30 a.m. and opens for business at 8 a.m. closing at 6 p.m. This work is her family's means of sustenance. 

Ms. Lucrecia Miriam will use this loan to pay for an order of toys, radios, television sets, fans and Christmas decorations, since demand is going up as the Christmas season approaches. 

Ms. Lucrecia approached Ceprodel to seek support through a loan in order to increase her inventory with better quality products. Thus she may satisfy her customers so as to make better earnings and improve her and her family's quality of life. 

Ms. Lucrecia's dream is to help her daughter set up her clinical laboratory.

loans.use: to purchase toys, radios, television sets, fans and Christmas decorations.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy, de 45 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Luis, su esposo desde hace 30 años. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, todos ellos menores a los que cuida en la casa que heredó de su mamá, donde vive desde que nació. Sus hijos aún son pequeños, por eso tiene que incrementar sus fuerzas al doble para poder sacarlos adelante. Mientras que su esposo se dedica al noble oficio de albañil, ella comienza el día con la preparación de exquisita comida de casa y los fines de semana preparan comida típica y caldos para sus comensales. Ya tiene 15 años dedicándose a esto, por eso todos la conocen y aprecian mucho, además de ser la única que brinda ese servicio. Pero como es una señora trabajadora, dedicó sus tiempo libres en la venta de ropa variada a los pobladores de su localidad, quienes se siente agradecida con ella, pues deja al crédito algunas prendas, para pagar después. Ahora desea incrementar sus ganancias para poder poner una tienda de venta de ropa, estable y así no tener que vender como ambulante de casa en casa. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Manos fuertes” y este es el crédito número 16 con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda económica para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Nancy; invertirá el dinero en la compra de ropa variada para su negocio.
texts.en:
Nancy is 45 years old and a hard-working woman. She lives with Luis, her husband of 30 years. They have five children, all are younger and she looks after them in the home she inherited from her mother, where she has been living since she was born. 

Her children are still small, and that is why she has to redouble her efforts so that she can help them get ahead in life. While husband works in the noble trade of bricklaying, she starts the day by preparing a delicious homemade meal. On weekends they prepare traditional food and soups for their dining customers. 

She has 15 years working in this business already, and that is why everyone knows her and really appreciates her. In addition, she is the only one who offers that service. But as she is a hard-working woman, she devotes her free time to selling a variety of clothing to the residents of her neighborhood. They are grateful to her, because she extends credit for some articles of clothing so that customers can pay later. 

Now she wishes to increase her earnings so that she can set up a store for selling clothing on a regular basis, and not have to sell door-to-door.  

She belongs to the "Manos Fuertes" solidarity group, and this is her 16th loan with MFP. There she feels fulfilled, as she can obtain the financial help to progress in her business. For this reason, she promises to pay her installments on time. 

Nancy will use the money to purchase a variety of clothing for her business.

loans.use: To buy a variety of clothing.

loans.name: Sandra Del Socorro

texts.es:
La Señora Sandra del Socorro tiene un negocio de producción y venta de películas y discos musicales ubicado en el centro  de la ciudad de león desde hace 12  años, sale de su casa a las 7:00 am y abre su negocio a las 8:00 am cerrándolo a la 6:00 pm  siendo este trabajo el sustento de su familia.

La señora Sandra del Socorro utilizara este crédito para compra reproductores de CD y DVD, para lograr una mayor reproducción ya que se le aumentado la demanda de su clientes  producto a la temporada navideña que se aproxima.

Doña Sandra  solicita crédito a  CEPRODEL para lograr una mayor  reproducción de CD Y DVD, y esto le permita tener más ganancias, y lograr sueño como es   ponerle su negocio a cada uno de sus 6 hijos.
texts.en:
Ms. Sandra del Socorro has a business reproducing and selling music and movies on disc, located in the downtown area of the city of Leon, which she has had for 12 years. She leaves home at 7 a.m. and opens her business at 8 a.m., closing at 6 p.m. This work is her family's means of sustenance. 

Ms. Sandra del Socorro will use this loan to purchase CD and DVD burners in order to produce in greater quantity since demand has gone up with the approaching Christmas season. 

Ms. Sandra is seeking the loan from Ceprodel in order to produce more CDs and DVDs in order to have greater profits and achieve her dream to pass her business on to each of her six children.

loans.use: to purchase CD and DVD burners.

loans.name: Santos Felicita

texts.es:
La Señora Santos Felicita trabaja en un kiosco como cocinera desde hace  6 años ubicado en la terminal de buses donde elabora riquísimos platillos, realiza este  trabajo para  apoyar  a su esposo en el sustento del hogar, es madre de 6 hijos. 

 La señora Santos Felicita sale se sus casa a las 5:00 am y llega  a sus centro de labores  a las  6:00 am finalizando a las 5:00 pm. 

La Señora Santos Felicita solicita este crédito a Ceprodel para cubrir gastos medico tales  como cirugía y medicamento de su esposo.
texts.en:
Santos Felicita has worked in a kiosk at a bus terminal as a cook for 6 years. She prepares delicious dishes. She works to support her husband in keeping up their home and is a mother of 6 children.

Santos Felicita leaves her home at 5:00 am, arrives at work at 6:00 am and finishes at 5:00 pm.

Santos Felicita requests this loan from Ceprodel to cover medical expenses such as surgery and medication for her husband.

loans.use: to pay medical expenses such as surgeries and medication.

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.es: María Jesús vive junto a su compañero de vida  y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de hamacas de diferentes tamaños y estilos, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en la producción, el negocio esta ubicado en su residencia, con ayuda de su esposo comercian por diferentes mercados y colonias pues ya tiene mucha clientela fija,  la prefieren porque vende un producto de calidad a un buen precio y además con un excelente servicio; María es una mujer dedicada a su labor, emprendedora y con muchos sueños por delante, dia a dia se esfuerza al máximo porque sabe que así alcanzara el éxito, con este financiamiento María desea lograr acrecentar su negocio y ahora que aumento la demanda quiere aprovechar y realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hilos por mayor de colores, madera, etc. María de Jesús tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Jesús lives with her life partner and their children. She sells hammocks of various sizes and styles. She has several years in this business and has acquired a great deal of experience in production. The business is located in her home, and with her husband's help they sell in various markets and neighborhoods. She already has many regular customers, who prefer her because she sells a quality product at a good price, and with excellent service also.  

Maria is a woman devoted to her work; enterprising and with many dreams for the future.  She does her very best every day, because she knows that this way she will achieve success. 

With this loan Maria wishes to succeed in making her business grow. Now that demand has increased, she wishes to take advantage of it and undertake a new investment, but she doesn't have the working capital, and that is why she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy colored thread, wood, etc. at wholesale.

María Jesús has good payment references and is confident she will be able to pay off the debt. At the same time she has faith that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy thread, wood, and rope at wholesale.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is a 40-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. She is from Getafe, Bohol, Philippines. 

She has been engaged in the fishing business for more than five years now. Her husband works as a fisherman.

Alma is requesting a loan to buy fuel and spare parts for the fishing boat. The loan would allow her husband to enhance his daily catch, thus increase their sales in the market.

In the future, Alma dreams of expanding their business so that it will augment their revenue enough to meet the needs of the family.

loans.use: to buy fuel and spare parts for the fishing boat

loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Eric is a 34-year-old, married man from Antequera, Bohol. He is the father of a 2-year-old child. He is engaged in a motorcycle transport business. He transports customers from place to place, within his municipality, to earn a living. He has been in the motorcycle transport business for five years. He requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase new tires and get other maintenance done for the motorcycle, like changing the oil once a month. This will enable him to continue serving his customers.

Eric would like to expand his business in the future, by investing in other kinds of business to support his family.

loans.use: to buy new tires and get other maintenance done for the motorcycle.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Desde hace 30 años Francisco se dedica a producir café, aunque fue desde pequeño que sus padres le enseñaron todo lo relacionado con este cultivo. Actualmente atiende su parcela con la ayuda de sus 5 hijos a los cuales él les ha enseñado el oficio de la producción de café. Durante la última cosecha él tuvo una producción de 11 toneladas de café  orgánico y  necesita un crédito para poder hacer labores de limpieza y preparación de su terreno para poder cultivar más café. A diferencia de la mayoría de los productores que desean aumentar su producción, él desea aumentar la calidad de su café y seguir manteniendo el suelo en buen estado por medio del uso de fertilizantes orgánicos que no dañen al medio ambiente, pues desea dejarles a sus hijos y nietos buenas tierras para que en un futuro ellos también puedan seguir cosechando café y continúen con la tradición familiar, actualmente cuenta con un vivero de plantas de café que vende para resiembra y que le sirve de sostén para su familia mientras llega el tiempo de cosecha.
texts.en:
Francisco has been producing coffee for 30 years, though from a young age his parents taught him everything related to this crop.

Currently he looks after his parcel of land with the help of his five sons, to whom he has taught the occupation of producing coffee.

During the last harvest he had an output of 11 tons of organic coffee, and needs a loan to be able to do clearing work and to prepare the land for growing more coffee. 

Unlike the majority of the producers, who wish to increase their production, he wishes to increase the quality of his coffee and continue maintaining the soil in good condition through the use of organic fertilizers that do not damage the environment. This is because he wishes to leave good land to his children and grandchildren, so that in the future they also can continue harvesting coffee and continue the family tradition.

Currently he has a nursery of coffee plants, which he sells for replanting, and which help him support his family until the harvest time arrives.

loans.use: To clear his parcel of land and prepare the soil for planting coffee.

loans.name: Magdalena Del Rosario

texts.es: Magdalena del Rosario de cuarenta y uno años de edad junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la confección y venta de ropa  para damas, caballeros y niños,  elabora blusas, vestidos, pantalones, camisas, entre otros todo desde de su vivienda, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la producción lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias; es muy conocida y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad de la ropa, los buenos precios y además por el excelente servicio; Magdalena es una mujer activa, dedicada a su labor, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, todos los días se esfuerza al máximo porque sabe que solo así lograra su objetivo, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos, agujas, sierres, etc.  Magdalena del Rosario tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Magdalena del Rosario is forty-one years old. Together with her life partner and her children, she works creating and selling clothing for women, men and children. She makes blouses, dresses, pants, and shirts, among others, all from her home. She has had this business for some years and it has given her a lot of experience in production, which allows her to obtain better earnings; she is very well-known and she already has many customers who prefer her because of the quality of her clothing, good prices and also for her excellent service.  

Magdalena is an active woman, dedicated to her work, with dreams of getting ahead. She is always on the lookout for new opportunities that will allow her to achieve success. Every day she gives her maximum effort because she knows that only in this way will she reach her objective. 

In the past weeks, her demand increased and she wants to take advantage of it to make a new loan. She needs the capital, and because of this she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to purchase wholesale fabric, thread, needles, zippers, etc. 

Magdalena del Rosario has good payment references and she is responsible. She assures that she will be able to pay off the debt, and at the same time, she trusts that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fabric in bulk, thread, needles, and zippers.

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es:
Eugenia de 55 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Félix su esposo desde hace 20 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Alejandro y William a quienes cuida en su casa propia. El trabajo al que se dedica está abnegada mujer es variado. En las mañanas trabaja como personal de limpieza en la gobernación de su localidad, donde recibe un sueldo mensual, ya por las tardes se dedica al cuidado de sus sembríos de maíz, papa y habas; los cuales comercializa en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Huancayo, donde es muy conocida por la calidad de sus sembríos. Los fines de semana vende flores ornamentales en un lugar céntrico de la ciudad, donde gracias a su esfuerzo y trabajo logró adquirir, es su mayor bien y lo aprovecha vendiendo flores hermosas para toda ocasión, cuenta que viaja una vez al mes al capital del país a comprar diversas variedades, ya es conocida pues tiene 12 años dedicándose a esto. Pero como aprovecha todas las oportunidades que tiene, también cría animales como ovejas, cerdos y vacas, que después vende a mayor precio, cuando estén maduras. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Manos fuertes” y este es el crédito número 16 con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda económica para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
Eugenia; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de abono orgánico, para distribuir entre sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Eugenia, 55, is a hardworking woman. She lives in the company of Felix, her husband of 20 years. Together they have two children: Alejandro and William whom they care for in their own home. The work to which this self-sacrificing woman devotes herself is varied. In the mornings she works on the cleaning staff of her town's government where she receives a monthly salary. In the afternoons she tends her plantings of corn, potato and beans which she sells in the wholesale market of the city of Huancayo where she is well-known for the quality of her crops. On weekends she sells ornamental flowers in a central location of the city, a spot she was able to acquire thanks to her effort and work. It is her primary property and she makes use of it selling beautiful flowers for all occasions. She comments that she travels monthly to the country's capital to purchase a diverse array of flowers. She is well-known because she has been doing this for 12 years. However, since she makes use of every opportunity that comes her way, she also raises animals such as sheep, pigs and cows which she later sells at a higher price once they have matured. 

She belongs to the "Manos fuertes" [Strong Hands] communal bank and this is her 16th loan with MFP where she feels she has developed since she gets the financial support she needs to progress in her business. Thus she commits to making her payments on time. 

Eugenia will invest the money requested in the purchase of organic fertilizer to distribute amongst her plantings.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Melecio

texts.en:
Melecio is a hard-working farmer, who lives at Padul with his wife and two children. The couple manages the farming business and gains 20,000 PHP each harvest season, twice a year. The income derived from the business goes for meals and the expenses of his children at school. 

He is now asking for a loan of 25,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in his farming business. It will ensure healthy crops to harvest. 

Melecio hopes to acquire abundant harvests and to gain more income for his children's education. He wants each of them to earn a degree and get good employment, someday.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in his farming business

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.en:
Ricardo is 43 years old and a married man, who has four children. The family peacefully lives at Padul. They are rice growers in their village, and growing rice is the family's main source of income. From the two-hectare rice field, they have been able to gain 20,000 PHP during each harvest season (twice a year). Ricardo is paying for matriculation fees and for daily allowances, required for his children to go to school. He would have liked to ensure good harvests, but has had insufficient funds until now. That is why he is asking for additional capital of 30,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and pay for labor costs of his farming. The additional profit generated will be invested for education, or saved for future expenses of the family. 

Ricardo hopes be a successful farmer.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor to help him in farming

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is 37 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of 30,000 Philippine pesos through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to purchase more grocery items to sell in her store.

Josefina has been in this business for eight years and has previously received funds through Kiva. She aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years. Emma requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more inventory of purified drinking water to sell.

In the future, Emma would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more purified drinking water to sell.

loans.name: Daler

texts.ru: Далер молодой парень. Пока не женат и живет со своими родителями. Далер  занимается ремонтами  помещений. Этим видом деятельности  он   занимается уже пять лет. Его отец  работает охранником, а мама домохозяйка занимается домашними делами. То что зарабатывают Далер и его отец все  уходит на проживание.Они давно хотят купить холодильник так как очень в нем нуждаются но ни как не могут накопить денег. Их старый холодильник уже не подлежит ремонту. Поэтому Далер обратился в Арванд за финансовой поддержкой и надеется получить кредит.Заранее благодарит.
texts.en: Daler is a young, single man who lives with his parents. For the past 5 years, he has been working in the field of building renovations. His father is a security guard and his mother is a homemaker. The salaries of both Daler and his father go to support the family. For a long time, they have wanted to buy a refrigerator because their old fridge is beyond repair, but so far they have been unable to save up enough money. For this reason, Daler has come to Arvand for financial support, and hopes to receive a loan. He is grateful in advance for the assistance.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es: Ofelia, de 29 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de sus 3 hijos: Madeli, Dayana y Darlin, a los que cuida en la casa que heredó hace 2 años. Ella es una mujer luchadora, desde joven aprendió a cuidar de sus hijos por ella misma, no se amilana ya que tiene mucho conocimiento de la vida en el campo. Su principal ingreso económico se centra en la producción de leche, posee 2 vacas, un ternero y un toro, espera poder más adelante adquirir más vacas, “el negocio de venta de leche es muy bueno, una empresa procesadora compra los litros que producen mis vacas todos los días”, afirma. Es por esa razón, que hace poco dejó de sembrara en cantidad, ahora solo posee pequeñas parcelas de sembríos como habas y papa, los que sigue comercializando pero en menor cantidad. Espero poder concretar la venta de una nueva vaca lechera para poder sembrar alfalfa en sus terrenos agrícolas y de esa manera poder alimentar a sus animales, pues quiere tener más de 10 vacas en producción.  Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “mujeres yanamarquinas” y este es el crédito número 3 con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda económica para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Ofelia, invertirá el dinero en la compra de una vaca lechera para aumentar la producción de leche de sus ganados.
texts.en:
Ofelia is 29 years old and a simple woman. She lives with her 3 children: Madeli, Dayana, and Darlin, who she cares for in the house that she inherited 2 years ago. She is a fighting woman; since she was a young woman, she learned to care for her children all by herself. She doesn’t get intimidated, as she has a lot of knowledge of life in the fields. Her main economic income centers on the production of milk; she has 2 cows, a calf and a bull. She hopes to be able to get ahead by acquiring more cows. 

“The business of selling milk is very good; a processing company buys the liters that my cows produce every day,” she states. 

It’s for this reason that a short time ago, she stopped sowing her fields in abundance; now, she only has small plots of land like beans and potatoes, which she continues selling but in smaller amounts. She hopes that the sale of a new milk cow will materialize so she can plant alfalfa on her farmland and in this way be able to feed her animals, as she wants to have more than 10 cows in production. 

She belongs to the collective group “Mujeres Yanamarquinas” (Yanamarquina Women) and this is her 3rd loan with MFP, where she feels developed, since she receives economic help to progress in her business. Because of this, she promises to be punctual in paying off her quotas. Ofelia will invest the money in the purchase of a milk cow in order to increase the milk production of her cattle.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy on overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Tojigul

texts.ru: Точигул молодая  женщина в возрасте 24 лет. Она замужем имеет одного ребенка.Муж Точигуль работает на государственной работе.Сама она занимается откормом скота на дому  и продажей  молока.  В наличие имеет 3 голов крупно рогатого скота и дойную корову которая дает по 10 литров молока каждый день. С раннего утра к ней домой приходят соседи и покупают молоко. Также Точигул  имеет несколько голов мелко рогатого скота. Точигул этим видом деятельности  занимается  с детство так как ее родители всю свою жизнь занимались этим делом. Она мечтает достойно вырастить своего ребенка и дать ему образование. Точигул на полученный кредит хочет увеличить поголовье скота и расширить свой бизнес. Она благодарит Арванд и надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Tojigul is a young woman of 24. She is married and has 1 child. Her husband works for the government, and Tojigul raises cattle at home and sells milk. She currently has 3 head of cattle and a dairy cow that gives 10 litres of milk per day. From the early morning, neighbours come to her house to buy milk. She also has a few head of smaller livestock. She has been working in animal husbandry from childhood, as this is what her parents had done their whole lives. Tojigul dreams of raising her child as best she can and giving him an education. She is planning to use the loan to increase the number of cattle she owns and to expand her business. She is grateful to Arvand and hopes for support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es:
