Genelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy rice grains to sell

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en: Rosalinda is married and has eight children. She is 59 years old and lives in the Philippines. Rosalinda is a farmer who operates a coconut and corn production business to earn a living. She has been doing this for 35 years, and every month she earn 8,000 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 9,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. Rosalinda been a member of GDMPC since 2007. In the future, Rosalinda hopes to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Glenda

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Glenda works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  Glenda is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell for her buying and selling rice business.

Glenda has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Lineth Yvana

texts.es: La Sra. Lineth tiene 34 años tiene 1 hijos  de la edad de 4 años, ella vive en la zona de Primavera,  la Sra. Lineth se dedica a la venta de variedad de dulces en su puesto de venta que se encuentra ubicado en la misma zona donde vive,  este préstamo es su primera  secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Lineth va a usar este préstamo para la compra variedad de dulces y galletas para surtir su y  de esta manera brindar variedad de productos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra. Lineth va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando productos y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener una tienda y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela. La Sra. Lineth es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada con la otorgación del crédito ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Lineth is 34 years old and has a son who is four years old. She lives in the Primavera area. Lineth sells a variety of sweets in her stall located in the same area where she lives. This loan is her first sequence in the institution. Lineth will use this loan to buy a variety of sweets and cookies to supply her business and thus provide variety of products for her customers. 

The reason to request a loan is to keep improving her business. Lineth will use the profits to continue buying products and thus improving her income. Her desire for the business is to have a store and thus serve better her customers. Lineth is very hardworking and is happy for the opportunity provided by this loan, because this is the only activity that allows her to support and help her family.

loans.use: to purchase sweets and cookies in bulk.

loans.name: Antonía

texts.es:
Doña Antonia es una señora de 42 años de edad ella es casada y vive en Sololá. Junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos de ellos 3 hombre y 1 mujer que estudian y trabajan juntos aportando a la economía y mejorando las condiciones de vida de toda la familia.
Ella es una mujer  trabajadora y con muchas ganas de superarse económicamente junto a su familia. Ella actualmente tiene el deseo de emprender un nuevo negocio en su vivienda ya que cuenta con el espacio suficiente para tener una tienda de abarrotes y tener al servicio de sus clientes  una máquina para hacer masa de maíz. Esto  estará beneficiando a muchas  familias cercanas a su vivienda.
De este modo ella ve su necesidad de invertir capital en  efectivo para la apertura de este negocio la cual solicita un préstamo de Q 8,000.00 para pagar una  máquina para hacer masa de maíz que recién compraron. De este modo estará teniendo mejores ingresos junto a su tienda abarrotes mejorando las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
Con las ganancias que le deje este negocio ella sueña tener una crianza de cerdos  y de pollos ya que cuenta con un hijo que tiene experiencia en esta actividad, trabajando unidos por la familia.
texts.en: Antonia, 42, is married and lives in Solalá. Antonia, her husband, and her four children, three sons and one daughter, study and work together, contributing to the household economy and improving the whole family's quality of life. She is a hard-working woman and really wants to move forward economically with her family. Currently, she wants to start a new business in her home, since she has enough space to have a grocery store and have a machine to make corn dough available to her customers. This will benefit many families near her home. This is why she sees the need to invest in opening this business, which is why she is applying for a loan of 8,000.00 GTC to pay for a corn dough machine that they recently bought. This way, she will have a better income, and this together with her grocery store will improve her family's quality of life. With the income from this business, she dreams of raising pigs and chickens, since one of her sons has experience in this activity. They would work together for the family.

loans.use: to buy a machine to make corn dough.

loans.name: Mario Manuel

texts.es:
Mario es un hombre de 42 años, vive en la ciudad de Camaná con su esposa y sus hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, en sus ratos libres le gusta viajar y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Saltado de Carne para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Mario trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, el cuenta con un pequeño auto, el cual utiliza para hacer taxi, todas las mañanas desde tempranas horas sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Mario se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento general y la compra de llantas nuevas para su auto; de esta manera Mario tendrá su vehículo en mejores condiciones para seguir trabajando, así pues él espera aumentar sus servicios e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Mario is 42 and lives in the town of Camana with his wife and children, whom he loves and are his main reason in life. He is a very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic person. Together with his wife, they dedicate all their efforts to getting their family ahead. In his spare time, he enjoys traveling, and on occasion, cooking a delicious beef saltado to share with his family.

With much effort and dedication, Mario works every day to provide transportation services. He has a small car, which he uses as a taxi. Every morning, he goes out in the early hours to drive around the city streets in search of passengers. He can work for approximately 12 hours and he believes he does well because of his pleasant demeanor towards his customers.

Mario is grateful to Kiva lenders, and thanks to the assistance provided, he will perform general maintenance and buy new tires for the car. In this way, Mario will have his vehicle in better condition and he will be able to continue working. He hopes to improve his services and increase their income, which will do much to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to perform general maintenance and purchase tires for his car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.en:
Bernardo is 35 years old, married, and has three school-age children. He aimes to upgrade their living condition in order for him to educate his children and give them a better life. 

He engages himself in the buying and selling of soft drinks and other beverages to generate income. He has been in this business for almost two years and usually earns a profit of PHP 10,000.00 a month. His income is usually spent on the family's daily consumption and allowances of his children in school. He has planned to acquire more soft drinks and beverage to sell in their community, but he doesn not have no enough capital. For this reason, he is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000.00 to buy additional stock of soft drinks and beverages to sell. He hopes that this loan will help him to improve the business to make it more profitable in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of soft drinks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Epefania

texts.en:
Epefania is 60 years old and is married with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Epefania has a firewood business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 25,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional firewood to sell.

Epefania has been in this business for 6 years. In the future, Epefania would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional firewood to sell

loans.name: Genalyn

texts.en: Genalyn, 29 years old, is a married entrepreneur from Pan-ay, Clarin. She has three children and earns an income from her transportation service business. She started this business almost seven years ago, and she earns 7,000 PHP a month. To improve business, she is borrowing 13,000 PHP from GDMPC, which she just joined in 2011, to obtain accessories and tires. Before long, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to obtain accessories and tires.

loans.name: Edmila

texts.en:
Edmila lives in Sisavan village of the Ararat region with her husband and 29-year-old son. She works at the local medical center as a doctor. Besides her work, Edmila also manages the household and has a greenhouse where she grows cucumbers, tomatoes and eggplant. 

With the requested loan, she is going to renovate the greenhouse and purchase fertilizer and seeds. She also plans to develop cattle breeding by purchasing cows. 

Edmila is hopeful that with the help of the loan, her business will grow enough so that she will gather a rich harvest and sell the products to the wholesalers and local market traders.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of the greenhouse and to purchase livestock, fertilizer and wheat seeds.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda works hard to support her family. She is a widow and has a vegetable selling business in the Philippines.

Erlinda has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy vegetable to sell. She has been in this business for 6 years now.

In the future, Erlinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell

loans.name: Artur

texts.en: Artur is 43 years old and is from Norashen village in the Ararat region of Armenia. He lives with his 38-year-old wife and 23-year-old daughter and works at a local hospital as a doctor. Artur also keeps a greenhouse where he grows peach, plum, apricot, apple, and nut trees. He has requested a loan in order to renovate the greenhouse. This will significantly increase the level of harvest and profit from the sales of fruits and vegetables. With the help of the loan, Artur will improve the living conditions for his family as well as get necessary funds for his daughter’s education.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of his greenhouse

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase vegetable and fruit supplies.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 47 years old and married with one child. She works hard to provide for her family, running a general store in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 21,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy items such as shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari (convenience) store.

Josephine has been in this business for three years and has previously received funds through Kiva. She aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items such as shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Enock

texts.en: Enock is a hardworking twenty-nine-year-old man living in Kasese, Uganda. He is an accountant who works with the town council; he has been in this position for five years and works five days a week. His father inspired him to join the profession as a respectable gentleman working in public service, and Enock always wanted to emulate him. Like most employees in government, he faces challenges of low pay and price fluctuations. His dream is to be self-employed and buy land for farming, so he is requesting for a loan to buy land for farming.

loans.use: to buy land for farming.

loans.name: Jerine Ann

texts.en:
Jerine Ann is a 35-year-old woman who owns and manages a computer shop in her community. She is married and has three school-age children. She and her husband help each other in generating income to satisfy their necessities and finance the education of their children. They aim to become successful and financially stable in the future so that they will give their children a better life. 

In this regard, Jerine Ann is working to improve her computer shop to generate a higher income. She is asking for additional capital of PHP 20,000 to buy additional computers to rent and grocery items to sell. Through this financial assistance, she believes that she will be able to make an improvement in the business and hopes that someday she will achieve her goals.

loans.use: to buy additional computers to rent and grocery items to sell

loans.name: Varazdat

texts.en: Varazdat is a proactive, 26-year-old man who works at a local credit organization. Unfortunately, his salary is insufficient to make ends meet for a family of four (including his father, mother, and grandmother), but the family also has a farming business that helps them earn some stable income. Both Varazdat and his father are involved in agriculture and keep 10 colonies of bees and 2 cows. The loan requested will help Varazdat purchase 13 more colonies of bees, another cow, and grass. As there are always plenty of buyers for high-quality honey, Varazdat is hopeful that this loan will give him an opportunity to earn more income and ensure a better future for his family.

loans.use: to buy 13 colonies of bees, a cow, and grass

loans.name: Giran

texts.en: Giran is a married man who owns a retail shop which he has run for 7 years, having gotten startup capital from his butcher shop. He still supplements the butcher shop by selling produce. Inadequate capital is hampering acheiving his dreams of expanding his business to the wholesale level and educating his children through the university level. Giran is requesting for a loan to buy sugar, soap, and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap, and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Marlefe

texts.en: Marlefe is 22 years old, single, and lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, where she has earned a living for the last years by selling home use products and fruits. She makes PHP 4,000 a month and is applying for a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar, and coffee. Marlefe joined GDMPC this year as a way to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar, and coffee

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a 29-year-old farmer who practices mixed crop farming. He is married to Mary, who is a business lady. They are blessed with one child. He has been rearing pigs for the past year, earning a monthly income of KES 8,000 which he uses to support his family. 

He is applying for his first loan from KADET LTD after being introduced to the program by a KADET staff. John will use the loan to buy animal feed. 

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his child. His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and continue his venture into mixed crop farming.

loans.use: to buy feed for his pigs.

loans.name: Melba

texts.en:
Melba is 44 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for her children.

Melba runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell. She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, and other groceries. 

In the future Melba would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
Paulina is a 58-year-old married woman and a mother of six children from Getafe, Bohol.  Paulina has been engaged in a retailing business for more than ten years now. She sells various goods and commodities to the people in her community.

Paulina is asking for a loan to buy additional merchandise to sell in her store such as canned goods, noodles, soda, biscuits and other items. She believes that through this loan, she will be able to augment her stock and attract more customers and buyers in her store.

In the future, Paulina hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy additional merchandise to sell in her store such as canned goods, noodles, soda, biscuits and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years.

Helen requested a loan of 12,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase fishing nets and materials to repair her fishing boat.

In the future, Helen would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets and materials to repair her fishing boat

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 49 years old and married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family, running a business buying and selling firewood in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 10,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase additional firewood for resale.

Judith has previously borrowed and repaid 15 loans from NWTF. She has been running her firewood business for 16 years and also earns income from raising pigs. She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional firewood for resale

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 22-year-old gentleman living in Kagadi, Uganda. He started in agriculture, then got the capital to start a retail business. He now has a retail shop that he has run for 2 years. He used his previous loan to buy sugar and salt for resale.  He says inadequate capital is affecting the business.

Joseph's dreams are to build a permanent home, expand his business to new markets, and diversify into buying produce since there is a ready market. He intends to use the new loan to buy maize and beans for resale.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 60 years old and a business lady; she is married to John, a mixed crop farmer. They are blessed with six children. She has been running a green grocer business for the past ten years, with a monthly income of KES 1,500, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD, after being introduced to KADET by a credit officer. Catherine will use the loan to buy more vegetables and fruits for her business. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open a retail shop.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits for her business.

loans.name: Sonia Del Carmen

texts.es: Sonia de 28 años de edad, es una persona emprendedora y mucha visión para salir adelante. Ella vive junto a su esposo y un pequeño hijo quienes son su mayor razón de vivir, Sonia trabaja como cosmetóloga en su propio salón de belleza en donde realiza esta profesión desde hace 3 años, adquiriendo amplia experiencia y clientes también. Sonia solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder equipar su salón con todos los productos necesarios como: champú profesional, acondicionadores, tintes, así también para comprar productos de belleza y cosméticos. Sonia desea mejorar sus ganancias y así mismo mejorar sus servicios y de esta forma vivir mejor junto a su esposo y su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Sonia, 28 years old, is an entrepreneur with the vision to get ahead. She lives with her husband and a young son who are the best reasons to live.

Sonia works as a cosmetologist in her own beauty salon. She has been in this profession for three years, acquiring wide experience and customers too.

Sonia is asking for a loan from Integral in order to equip her salon with all the necessary products such as professional shampoo, conditioners, hair dyes, and also buying beauty products and cosmetics.

Sonia wants to increase her earnings and also improve her services in order to have a better life together with her husband and young son.

loans.use: to buy hair products for her beauty salon such as shampoo, conditioners, hair dyes, etc.

loans.name: Bernarda De Jesus

texts.es: Bernarda de 40 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora y agradecida con INTEGRAL por la ayuda apoyo brindado. Ella vive junto a su esposo y una hija de 16 años que se dedica a estudiar. Bernarda posee una venta de gas propano que comercializa desde su casa de habitación, así mismo posee una pequeña tienda. Ella dese poder surtir su tienda ya que hasta la fecha se le ha hecho muy difícil por sus propios medios por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el fin de comprar todo lo necesario como comida congelada, pan, leche, huevos, aderezos, y otros productos más. Con estos Bernarda espera mejorar en gran manera sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Bernarda, age 40, is a very hard-working person.  She is grateful to Integral for the support it has given her.  She lives with her husband and her 16 year old daughter, who goes to school.

Bernarda has a business selling propane gas from her house.  She also has a small store.  She wishes to be able to stock her store.  So far it has been very difficult for her to do so through her own means.  That is why she is requesting a loan from Intergral.  She will use the loan to buy everything needed like frozen food, bread, milk, eggs, seasonings, and other products.  By doing so Bernarda hopes to greatly improve her income.

loans.use: to buy propane gas and basic needs products to sell.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 33 years old and is married to Augustine, a businessman. They are blessed with two school-going children. She has been running a spare parts business for the past two years with a monthly income of 10,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), which she uses to support her family.

Judith is applying for her second loan from KADET LTD, after successfully repaying her previous loan. She will use the loan to buy more spare parts for her business.

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to expand her business and improve the family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more spare parts for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials needed in shoe repair

loans.name: Norma Carolina

texts.es: Norma de 35 años de edad es una persona muy alegre y responsable, ella vive junto a tu esposo y dos hijas menores de edad, quienes se dedican a estudiar. Norma trabaja muy duro para brindarle la ayuda necesaria a su esposo y así llevar el sustento diario a su hogar en su propia panadería en donde se encarga de realizar pan dulce y salado, y que posteriormente comercializa de forma ambulante con la ayuda de otra persona. La estabilidad de este negocio es muy importante para ella y su familia, razón principal  por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para comprar harina, manteca, miel, azúcar, levadura y otra  materia prima para elaborar más pan. Norma es muy dedicada a su trabajo lo que le permite contar con clientes satisfechos que consumen a diario sus productos, por lo que desea mejorar aún más.
texts.en:
Norma, 35 years old, is a happy and responsible person. She lives with her husband and two young daughters who go to school.

Norma works very hard in order to provide the necessary help to her husband and thus bring a livelihood to their home in her own bakery where she is in charge of making sweet and salted bread, and which is later sold by traveling about with the help of another person.

The stability of this business is very important for her and her family. The main reason that she is asking for a loan through Integral, is in order to buy flour, butter, honey, sugar, yeast, and other raw materials in order to make more bread.

Norma is very dedicated to her work allowing her to have satisfied customers who use her products daily, which is why she wants to improve even more.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as flour, butter, honey, sugar, and yeast to make bread in her own bakery.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra de 46 años de edad, vive junto a sus tres hijos menores de edad y su esposo junto a quien trabaja muy duro para salir adelante. Sandra posee un chalet en el que comercializa bebidas, golosinas, pan, pupusas, jugos, agua y otros más. Ella cuenta con varios clientes sobretodo personas que transitan en el lugar y estudiantes con lo que posee un negocio bastante rentable. Sandra solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda aumentar la cantidad de productos que ofrece y de esta forma contar con más clientes fijos lo cual es de mucha ayuda para ella ya que le permitirá mejorar significativamente sus ventas, lo que es de mucho beneficio.
texts.en: Sandra is forty-six years old and lives with her three children, all underage, and her husband. The couple works very hard to improve their lot in life. Sandra owns a small shop where she sells drinks, sweets, bread, sweetcorn tortillas, fruit juice, water, and other items. She has many customers, mainly commuters and students, who make her shop profitable enough. Sandra asks field partner INTEGRAL for a loan in order to offer more products at her shop and thus have more returning customers, which would help her significantly increase her sales and her income.

loans.use: to buy supplies to sell at her convenience store.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Thirty-seven-year-old Godfrey is an agriculturalist, who deals in dried produce. He has run this business for a period of three years. He started this business with capital he earned by farming, growing maize and beans. He says inadequate capital is the factor affecting the business. He would like to buy a car one day, to help in transportating the produce to bigger markets. He also would like to construct a house for his residence in the future, as he is currently living in a rented house.

Godfrey is requesting a loan to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more beverages to offer for sal

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley, age 37, runs a grocery business. She and her husband, who is a farmer, have one child. Her shop allows her to bring in a small income to supplement her spouse's income, and she sells her wares to the people in her village. She acquires PhP 10,000 each month and uses this income to supply her family with meals and to give her child a school allowance. 

She would like to make her business profitable but presently has insufficient funds to ensure this outcome. She is therefore asking for a loan of PhP 20,000 in order to buy sardines, noodles, bread, soap, and shampoo to sell in her store. Shirley intends to continue expanding services to her customers to gain more revenue. 

Shirley will be happy and proud to see her child become a professional in her career and to attain good employment someday.

loans.use: to buy sardines, noodles, bread, soap, and shampoo to sell in her store

loans.name: Donabel Mary

texts.en:
Donabel Mary dreams of becoming a successful business woman in the future. She is 43 years old, married, and has two school-aged children. Due to a lack of job opportunities, she engages in selling footwear and RTW in a public market. ("RTW" means ready-to-wear clothes.) She has been operating the business for almost two years and usually earns a profit of PHP 8,000 a month. She usually spends her profit for her family's daily consumption and the costs of sending her children to school. 

Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, she aims to strengthen her business to generate a higher income. But due to insufficient capital, she is asking for a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy additional stocks of sandals, slippers, shoes and RTW, to resell in her community. Despite competitors in the area, she believes that she can improve the business as she continues to work hard and strive harder.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of footwear and clothing, to resell at the public market

loans.name: Caridad Bonna

texts.en:
Caridad Bonna, age 39, is a vegetable vendor, running a "talipapa" (vegetable stall) in Pallua to earn her income. She is a college graduate and once worked at an insurance company, but she aspires to manage her own business. She has managed her small vegetable stall for about one year and earns PhP 12,000 each month. She uses her income to support herself and for reinvestment into revolving capital for the business. She is unmarried.

She would like to request a loan in the amount of PhP 20,000 in order to buy cabbages, tomatoes, eggs, bread, and eggplants to sell. 

Caridad Bonna would like to continue extending good services to her customers and to increase her income, so that her business can develop and grow. She is confident that her business will eventually lead her to attain financial stability.

loans.use: to buy cabbages, tomatoes, eggs, bread, and eggplants to sell

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 33-year-old married man with three children living in Kagadi, Uganda. He is a teacher and has been in the profession for four years. Inspiring young people has always been his dream and there could not be a better way to do this than teaching--that is the reason he joined the profession. 

He faces challenges of low pay and price fluctuations. He dreams of buying land for farming and educating his children to attain degrees as minimum qualifications.

Robert is requesting this loan to buy land for farming.

loans.use: to buy land for farming

loans.name: Mila

texts.en:
Mila is 52 years old, married and has three children. Her youngest child still attends school. To earn income, for over 10 years Mila has been managing a store where she sells grocery items. She usually earns about 10,000 PHP each month and this money goes for meals and school expenses. 

She would like to increase her sales capacity and keep earning a good income, so she is borrowing 30,000 PHP to buy eggs, noodles, bread, soft drinks and sardines to sell in her store.

Mila hopes to keep generating good sales and still extend her friendly ways to her customers. This will lead her to achieve financial stability someday.

loans.use: to buy eggs, noodles, bread, soft drinks and sardines to sell in her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his rice farm

loans.name: David

texts.es: David de 48 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos, con esfuerzo aun están estudiando en la escuela, son una familia humilde pero trabajadora. David es motorista de profesión, es un hombre trabajador, honesto y responsable que se ha caracterizado por llevar lo mejor y esencial a su casa. Junto a su esposa poseen un negocio de venta de atados de dulce, une venta con la cual ambos día a día desean entregarle lo mejor a sus hijos y se destacan por  por ser emprendedores y a la vez responsables. David desea incrementar mas sus ventas pero no posee los recursos y es por eso que decidió junto a su esposa acercarse a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar materia prima que permita continuar produciendo sus dulces muy usados para endulzar platillos típicos como arroz en leche, atoles, ayotes en miel, entre otros varios. El cliente cuenta con buenas referencias crediticias. Confía en Dios y su trabajo para solventar con seguridad su deuda
texts.en:
David, 48 years old, lives with his wife, and four children struggling to attend school, a humble and hardworking family.

David is a driver by profession. He is a hard worker, honest and responsible which has been characterized by doing his best and what is required for his home. 

He has a business with his wife selling packaged sweets, uniting them both daily making sacrifices for their children and standing out as being enterprising and responsible. David wants to increase the sales more but does not have the resources and this is why he and his wife decided to come to Integral to ask for a loan which will permit them to buy the raw materials to allow them to continue producing the sweets often used to sweeten typical dishes such as rice pudding, porridge, honey squash, among several others.

The customer has good credit references, and trusts in God and his work in order to repay his loan.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as sugar cane and firewood to use when making packaged sweets for the business he has with his wife

loans.name: Margarita Esmeralda

texts.es: Margarita de 36 años de edad, es una madre muy responsable y trabajadora, quien vive única mente junto a su pequeño hijo de seis años de edad, su esposo vive en Los Estados Unidos y le ayuda económicamente. Margarita se dedica a la elaboración de pupusas, tortas mejicanas y otros productos elaborados a base de maíz como: pasteles, enchiladas y otros más. Ella realiza sus ventas de forma ambulante y en su casa de habitación y solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder comprar un carretón que tiene una pequeña cocina incluida para elaborar las tortas mejicanas y así mismo vender los otros productos. Con esto ella podrá movilizarse de una forma más fácil y así mismo podrá elaborar parte de sus platillos en el momento.
texts.en: Margarita, age 36, is a very responsible and hard-working mother. She lives only with her little six year old child. Her husband lives in the United States and helps her financially. Margarita makes pupusas, sandwiches, and other products made from corn like cakes, enchiladas, and others. She sells in an itinerant manner and at her house. She is requesting a loan from Integral to be able to buy a small cart that has a small cooker included in order to make the sandwiches and sell her products right there. By doing so she will be able to move around more easily, and she will be able to make part of her dishes at the time she is selling them.

loans.use: to buy a small cart in order to sell food in an itinerant manner.

loans.name: Rosa Imelda

texts.es: Rosa de 43 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres niños menores de edad, quien vive desde hace catorce años en el mismo lugar, por lo que es muy conocida en la zona y cuenta con muy buenas referencias. Rosa trabaja elaborando desayunos y almuerzos, su negocio esta ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico ya que es de mucho comercio y afluencia de personas lo que le brinda grandes beneficios. Rosa solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar arroz, frijoles, y diferentes tipos de carnes para elaborar mayor variedad de comida y así contar con más clientes fijos. Rosa es muy trabajadora y lo principal que desea es poder mejorar sus ganancias y darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en: Rosa is forty-three and is a single mother of three young children.  She has lived in the same place for fourteen years.  She is very well-known in the area and has good references.  Rosa works making breakfasts and lunches.  Her business is located in a very strategic place with a lot of business and an influx of people, which is very beneficial for her.  She is requesting a loan from Integral to be able to buy rice, beans, and different types of meat to make a greater variety of food and to have a more fixed clientele.  Rosa is very hard-working and the main thing that she hopes for is to be able to increase her profits and to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to buy basic grains to make lunches and breakfasts to sell.

loans.name: Benson

texts.en:
Benson, age 28, runs a produce business and a motorcycle transport business in Kagadi. He has been engaged in these ventures for the past four years. He started his business with capital received from harvesting and selling his maize and beans. In order to shorten the supply chain, he then decided to buy from other farmers and sell at a profit. He used his previous loan to buy maize and beans to offer for sale. 

Inadequate capital is the factor affecting his business. His dreams are to ensure the education of his two children and to own one of the biggest food stores in town. 

Benson intends to use this loan to buy maize and beans to offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to offer for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fish to resell

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 23-year-old businessman. He is single but supports his parents. He has been selling mobile phones and accessories for the past two years. He uses his monthly income of 8,000 KES to meet his basic needs. 

Joseph is applying for his first loan term from KADET Ltd. after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Joseph will use the loan to buy more phones. With the anticipated profit, he will expand his business. His hopes and dreams are to educate his siblings and improve his living standard.

loans.use: to buy more phones for his business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages for his store

loans.name: Marta Isabel

texts.es: Marta de 48 años de edad, es una persona muy honesta y trabajadora, ella se dedica de lleno a brindarles todo lo mejor a sus dos hijos menores de edad, quienes han salido adelante gracias al esfuerzo de Marta. Ella posee una venta de tortillas desde hace varios años donde elabora las tortillas de lunes a domingo todos los mediodías, con lo que pueda llevar el sustento a su hogar el cual depende por completo de su esfuerzo. Marta solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar maíz por mayor para poder obtenerlo a menores precios, así mismo para comprar mayor cantidad de leña, con esto Marta tendrá la oportunidad de mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Marta, who is 48 years of age, is a very honest and hardworking person. She is determined to give every opportunity to her two children who are minors and who have done well thanks to her hard work. She has been selling tortillas for several years. She prepares the tortillas at midday every day from Monday to Sunday. The money she earns from this activity enables her to support her family; the household depends entirely on her income. 

Marta is requesting this loan in order to buy corn at wholesale prices, which are lower, and also to buy a larger quantity of firewood. In this way Marta will have the opportunity to improve her profits.

loans.use: to buy firewood and corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more shoes to have more variety.

loans.name: Vilma Guadalupe

texts.es: Vilma, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su familia. Ella se dedica a la producción y venta de alimentos es decir posee su negocio propio de comida. La ubicación del negocio se encuentra en una zona accesible, sobre calle principal y es muy conocida porque la comida que vende es muy rica. Vale la pena destacar que es una mujer trabajadora,  responsable y muy valiente. Gracias  a la gran experiencia con la que cuenta ha logrado ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales confían mucho en su trabajo y están muy satisfechos con el servicio que reciben. Además, ella tiene muy en cuenta la calidad y precios de la comida ya que en este tipo de negocios es lo más importante para los clientes. Todos los días se levanta muy temprano para atender su hogar como a  su negocio. Ella desea ampliar su negocio es por esta razón que su sueño es mantener activo su negocio por mucho más tiempo dado que es una de sus principales fuentes de ingresos. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: frijoles, maíz, arroz, queso, tomates, pollo, carnes etc. Espera que esta decisión le permita aumentar sus ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad  de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Vilma lives in her own house along with her family.  She makes a living by making and selling food.  Her business is located in a very accessible area, on the main street, and she is very well-known because the food she sells is very delicious.  It's worth pointing out that she is a hard-working, responsible, and brave woman.  Thanks to the experience she has, she has been able to earn the trust of her nieghbors, who trust a lot in her work and are very satisfied with the service they receive.  She is also very cognizant of the quality and prices of the food, since in this type of business, these things are very important to customers.  She gets up very early every day to attend to her home and her business.  She wants to expand her business, which is why her dream is to keep her business active for mouch longer since it is one of her main sources of income.  She has decided to request a loan from Integral to invest in her business by buying necessary supplies such as beans, corn, rice, cheese, tomatoes, chicken, meat, etc.  She hopes that this decision lets her increase her income and to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies that she needs like: beans, corn, rice, cheese, tomatoes, chicken, meat, etc.

loans.name: Mark

texts.en:
Mark is a married man who has two children, living in Kagadi,Uganda. For two years he has been operating an Internet cafe, and with the money he earned he has been able to buy a plot of land, and provide the basics to his young family. After completing his studies he decided to explore his dream of becoming self-employed, and that is why he ventured into business. Lack of enough computers to serve the increasing number of clients and inefficient electricity supply are his major challenges. His dream is to have one of the most efficient Internet cafes in the district. 

Mark is requesting the loan facility to buy computers for his Internet cafe business.

loans.use: to buy computers for his Internet cafe business.

loans.name: Olga

texts.en: Olga lives in the Dimitrov village of the Ararat region with her husband and three daughters. The only income the family receives comes from agriculture. They keep pigs and chickens and grow potato and cucumber in the greenhouse. Olga has applied for this loan to purchase onion seeds and fertilizer. With the loan she will also renovate the greenhouse and buy a polyethylene cover for it. She hopes that the expansion of the business will give her an opportunity to cover the basic needs of her family and ensure their livelihood.

loans.use: to pay for onion seeds, fertilizer, a polyethylene cover for the greenhouse and renovation of the greenhouse.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth, age 53, is a mixed-crop farmer. Her husband Patrick runs his own business. They have three children. Elizabeth has been in the farming business for the past 20 years and has a monthly income of KES 6,000, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan term from KADET Ltd after being introduced by a member of KADET staff. Elizabeth will use her loan funds to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm. 
 
With the anticipated profit from the business, she will ensure the education of her children. Her primary goal is eventually to export her farm produce.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for motorcycle maintenance

loans.name: Blanca Eloisa

texts.es: Blanca de 43 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo e hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio, posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad, como granos básicos, pan dulce, huevos, carnes, embutidos, entre otros, desde hace varios años. La tienda está ubicada en su casa, la cual ha sabido adecuar de tal forma que llame la atención de los clientes que en la mayoría son sus vecinos.  Sus clientes dan buenas referencias tanto de su trabajo como de su persona. Es muy conocida y preferida ya que es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora la cual ha sabido ganarse su confianza. Su mayor deseo es seguir recibiendo los ingresos de su negocio que hasta el momento le han ayudado a cubrir gran parte de las necesidades de su hogar. Es por esta razón que se decidió en hacer este préstamo con el fin de incrementar su inventario ya que no cuenta con los recursos necesarios  para realizar dicha inversión por sus medios. El crédito que solicita a INTEGRAL es para comprar variedad de productos de tienda tales como: aceite, arroz, azúcar, frijoles, golosinas, bebidas, macarrones, etc. ya que desea cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado que le permita incrementar sus ingresos de tal forma que pueda ofrecer a su familia mejores oportunidades de vida.-
texts.en:
Blanca, age 43, lives in her own house with her husband and children.  She works in commerce.  She has a store where she has been selling basic needs products like basic grains, bread, candy, eggs, meat, and sausages, among others for several years.

The store is in her house, which she knew how to adapt in a way that gets her customers’ attention.  Most of her customers are her neighbors.  Her customers give her good references as much for her work as for her as a person.  She is very well-known, and she is popular because she is a very kind and hard-working woman who has known how to win the trust of her customers.  

Her greatest wish is to continue receiving the income from her business, which so far has helped her cover a large part of her household’s necessities.  That is the reason she decided to request this loan in order to increase her inventory.  She does not have the necessary resources to make this investment on her own.

The loan she is requesting from Integral is to buy a variety of products for her store.  She will buy things like cooking oil, rice, sugar, beans, candy, drinks, and macaroni, etc.  She wishes to cover a greater market demand, which will allow her to increase her income so that she is able to offer her family better life opportunities.

loans.use: to buy products for her store like cooking oil, rice, sugar, beans, candy, drinks, and macaroni, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more animal feeds to resell in her feed store.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es: Vicenta, habita sola en casa familiar. Ella se dedica al comercio de  ropa interior para hombre y mujer, con esfuerzo y dedicación posee un humilde negocio que es su principal fuente de ingreso.  Ha trabajado toda su vida para poder ganarse el sustento diario, no cuenta con otra entrada de ingresos. Por lo que su deseo es mantener activo su negocio por mucho más tiempo. Ella es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada y carismática en su trabajo. Muchas personas la prefieren ya que en su negocio siempre hay variedad de prendas intimas y lo mejor de todo a precios muy accesibles.  Gracias a su experiencia y buen servicio a los clientes, ha logrado ganarse la confianza de ellos que cada día la prefieren más.  Tomó la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de mas ropa intima y tener variedad. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de mantener surtido su negocio para que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que buscan. De esta forma espera aumentar sus ganancias que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Vicenta lives alone in the family house.

She works selling underwear for men and women. Through her efforts and dedication she has a simple business that is her main source of income. She has worked all her life in order to earn her daily bread, not having other income, which is why she wants to keep her business active for a much longer time. She is an entrepreneur who is dedicated and charismatic in her work.

Many people favor her because her business always has a variety of intimate apparel and the best of everything at very good prices. Thanks to her experience and good service to her customers, she has earned their confidence and each day they solicit her more.

She made the decision to ask for a loan from Integral in order to invest in her business buying more intimate apparel to have a variety. All this is done in order to supply her business so that the customers always find what they are looking for. Thus, she hopes to expand her earnings to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more intimate apparel in order to have a variety of merchandise to sell in her business

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en: Marissa, a 41-year-old married mother of three children, all in school, is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For the past nine years she has been operating a fishing business in the Philippines. Now requesting a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment, Marissa would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Guliko

texts.en:
Guliko is 62 years old. She lives in a small village in the Baghdati district with her large family: her husband, daughter, son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. 

Guliko is provided with a retirement pension, and the family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a vineyard of 300 vine tree saplings. They pick the grapes and produce wine which is sold locally. Besides that, Guliko owns a grain mill which serves local farmers by crushing their grain. She earns a service fee during the whole year. 

Guliko is a very hardworking woman, with a rich experience in her work. She requested a loan to purchase a milking cow. She will produce milk products and sell the milk locally at a good price. It will significantly increase the income of the family. The increased income will improve the family's business and their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a milking cow.

loans.name: Bellkize

texts.en:
Bellkize is twenty-eight years old. She is married, has three girls and lives in the Roma community along with her husband's brother. Her husband works as a cleaner, and he is the main source of their income. Her oldest daughter suffers from a serious disease, which they worry about in regards to her health and treatment. Recently, her husband’s brother married, and they moved into another room in the same house, which is incomplete and in need of renovation.  

Bellkize is requesting a loan to renovate the room and improve their living conditions, which are in urgent need of improvement. Bellkize hopes to one day have her own home and to secure a better life for her children. She is very grateful to all Kiva lenders for this support.

loans.use: to renovate her room.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is a 40-year-old business lady. She is a single mother of three children. She has been sewing pullovers for the past six years. She uses her monthly income of 4,000 Kenyan shillings to support her family.

Veronica is applying for her first loan from KADET Ltd after being introduced by a KADET staff member. She will use the loan to buy a sewing machine for her business. With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hope and dream is to open a retail shop in the near future.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for her business

loans.name: Lidia Marleni

texts.es: Lidia Marleni de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida, ella  se dedica a la compra y venta de productos por catálogo, como cremas, perfumes, cosméticos, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su hogar y en forma ambulante se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque todo lo que venden es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además del servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Lidia es una mujer  activa, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora todos los días se esfuerza por trata de cumplir sus sueños sabe que solo con constancia y amor al trabajo podrá alcanzar ese éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cremas, perfumes, cosméticos etc. Lidia Marleni tiene buenas referencias de pago, es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Lidia Marleni is 43 years old, and lives with her life partner. She buys and sells catalog products, such as creams, perfumes, cosmetics and other items. She has several years in the business and that has provided her with a great deal of experience, which allows her to obtain the best earnings. 

She sells from home and door-to-door, and has acquired a large clientele. People prefer her because everything she sells is top quality and affordable. Besides the unmatched service, she is always at the service of her clients. 

Lidia is a an energetic woman, devoted to her work and very determined.  Every day she does her best to to try to fulfill her dreams. She knows that only with perseverance and love of work will she be able to achieve that success. 

In recent weeks demand for products has increased and she wants to restock. That is why she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy creams, perfumes, cosmetics, etc. 

Lidia Marleni has good payment references, and is very responsible. She is confident she will be able to pay off the debt and at the same time,  has faith that she will give her family a better life.

loans.use: To buy creams, perfumes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Sra. Isabel tiene 53 años, casada con tres hijos de las edades de 18, 20 y 25 años, ella se dedica a la  venta de verduras y papa, tiene su puesto de venta que se encuentra en uno de los mercados de la zona 14 de septiembre, este préstamo es el primero dentro de la institución, la Sra. Isabel va a utilizar este préstamo para la compra de variedad de verduras por mayor como cebolla, variedad de  vegetales y también una carga de papa la Sra. Isabel  enfrenta retos en su negocio que el tener que levantarse temprano para comprar sus verduras y la competencia ya que en el mercado existe varias vendedoras de verduras y  va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando cosas para su vivienda, se siente feliz ya agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Isabel is 53 years old, married with three children ages 18, 20, and 25 years old.

She works selling vegetables and potatoes. She has a stall that is located in one of the markets in the area of 14 de Septiembre. 

This is her first loan from the institution. She is going to use this loan to buy a variety of vegetables at wholesale such as onions and other kinds of vegetables and also a load of potatoes.

Isabel faces challenges in her business such as getting up early in order to buy the vegetables and competition in the market because there are several vegetable sellers. 

She will use the profits to continue buying things for her home and she feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and potatoes at wholesale for her stall at the market

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is a thirty-two-year-old married woman and a mother of three young children, ages four, six and seven. She has been running a sari-sari, or variety store, for more than three years now, selling various goods to the people in her local area. Mercedita works hard to support her husband in meeting the needs of the family, especially for the schooling of their children. 

Mercedita is asking for a loan to buy more stocks to sell in her store, such as soda, canned goods, biscuits, soap and shampoo. In the future, Mercedita hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell in her store, such as soda, canned goods, biscuits, soap and shampoo.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: El Sr. Pablo tiene 66  años casado con tres hijos de las edades de 35,25 y 20 años ya independientes, el se dedica a la venta  de comida en su puesto de venta se encuentran en la zona de Wilacota este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Pablo va a usar este préstamo para la compra de insumos como abarrotes y verduras para la elaboración de sus comidas,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital,  El Sr. Pablo enfrenta retos en su negocio que son crecer en clientela y va a utilizar los beneficios mejorar  su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sr. Pablo is 66 years old, married, and has three children (ages 35, 25, and 20) who are already independent. He sells food from a vending stall in the District of Wilacota.

This loan is his first with Emprender. Sr. Pablo will use the money to buy supplies, such as groceries and vegetables, for preparing his meals. The reason he is requesting this loan is because he lacks capital. Sr. Pablo faces challenges in his business, such as growing his customer base. He will utilize the benefits of this loan so that he can improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies in bulk for preparing meals.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is a 37-year-old farmer in Kitale county where she lives with her husband and three children, all of whom are attending school. She has been farming for the past 15 years producing poultry products, maize and horticultural crops which she sells to the people around her locality. She also sells second-hand clothes as an additional source of income.

Leah is requesting a 60,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry birds. From this she will sell products and increase her income, helping to raise her living standards and pay for her children's school fees.

High costs of feed, diseases and an unreliable market for her produce are her major challenges in farming.

She is grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for offering her the loan.

loans.use: to purchase poultry birds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Thoidam Group

texts.en:
This is Thoidam Group. In 2009, these tribal women living in Manipur, in the northeastern part of India, came together to collectively help and support each other getting loans and venturing into the business sector – a field in which they had little knowledge.

Agamla, with the raised hand, is 49 years old and is the mother of four sons and a daughter. She is now living with her youngest son, 20 years old; her daughter, 14 years old; and her husband, who is a cultivator by profession.

With Agamla's first loan of 5,000 Indian rupees (INR), she cultivated ginger along with her husband. With her second loan of 10,000 INR she was able to open a small grocery shop in her village where she sells dal, soap, sugar, spices, flour, oil (for cooking), candles and cell batteries, to name some items. She also sells vegetables from her homestead garden such as cabbage, chilly, lady's fingers [okra] and pumpkin. 

Her business has helped her meet the needs of her son and daughter for their schooling. She says, “I am thankful that today your contribution has made me a better mother, and I am so happy that my son has completed his matriculation and my daughter will appear for her matric exam in 2013, which I was unable to provide for my older three sons who are married now.”

Agamla needs another loan of 10,000 INR in order to expand her grocery shop into a departmental store and continue to serve her family and her community by bringing in goods closer to the people through her store. She plans to add utensils and cosmetics to the grocery products she has been selling. She will carry pots for cooking and storing water, spoons, tea funnels, tongs, kettles, bowls, soap cases and the like. Simple cosmetics products such as lipstick, nail polish, eye liner, deodorant and nail files are a few items to name. 

Likewise, the rest of the group members are very hardworking and want another loan to do better in their businesses of weaving, meat selling, ginger farming and charcoal selling.

loans.use: to expand her existing village grocery store with utensils and cosmetics items.

loans.name: Biviana Aurelia

texts.es:
Biviana es una mujer de 51 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, es madre soltera de tres hijo, que ya son mayores, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Biviana no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Diseño de Modas, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Tallarines con Carapulcra para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Biviana trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, adicionalmente también brinda servicios de compostura de prendas de vestir, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Biviana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como prendas de vestir tanto para damas, caballeros y niño; de esta manera Biviana tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido para la temporada de verano, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su tienda de ventas de ropa en un centro comercial de su ciudad.
texts.en:
Biviana is a 51-year-old woman who lives in the city of Ica. She is the single mother of three grown children whom she loves and who are her main purpose in life. She is a very kind person, hard-working and enthusiastic, who puts all her efforts towards moving her family ahead. Regrettably, due to a lack of financial resources, and due to the need to work to cover her expenses, Biviana was not able to study for a professional career in Fashion Design, but she would very much have liked to be able do so. In her free time, she likes to listen to music, and sometimes she cooks some delicious noodles with carapulcra (meat and potato stew) to share with her family.

With a lot of hard work and dedication, Biviana works in her small business selling clothing. She also offers clothing repair services. Every day starting early in the morning she begins her work. She can work approximately 8 hours and she believes that it is going well for her because of the kind treatment she gives her customers.

Biviana is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help given she will be able to buy merchandise such as clothing for women, men, and children. In this way Biviana's business will be better supplied for the summer season, so she will continue working and striving to achieve her great dream of having her clothing store in a shopping mall in her city.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell

loans.name: Manuel Augusto

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre de 57, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposa y sus dos hijos, a quienes ama y son principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo Manuel pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Agrónoma, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones su esposa cocina una riquísima Pachamanca para engreírlo, ya que esta es su comida favorita.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Manuel se dedica a la agricultura, él cuenta con un pequeño terreno en el cual siembra algodón, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia sus labores de campo, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su experiencia.
Manuel se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de mantenimiento, riego y cosecha de su cultivo de algodón; de esta manera Manuel espera tener una buena cosecha para así poder venderla a un buen precio, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de en poco tiempo ampliar su negocio y tener diversas cosechas.
texts.en:
Manuel is a man of 57 years of age. He lives in the city of Ica with his wife and two children, whom he loves and they are the main reason for living. He is a very friendly person, hardworking and enthusiastic, and he and his wife put all their efforts towards raising their family.

Thanks to Manuel’s efforts he was able to study Agricultural Engineering. In his free times he likes to spend a bit of time reading and sometimes his wife cooks for him the tasty dish Pachamanca [Peruvian dish baked on top of heated stones, consisting of meat and produce] in order to spoil him, as this is his favorite food.

With a lot of effort and dedication, Manuel works day by day in agriculture. He has a small plot of land where he grows cotton. Every day in the early hours of the morning he begins his field labors, working approximately eight hours, and he believes that because of his experience things are going well.

Manuel is very grateful for the Kiva loans, and thanks to the help they give he can cover the cost of maintenance, irrigation, and harvesting the cotton crops. This is why Manuel hopes to have a good harvest in order to be able to sell it at a good price, and thus continue working and striving in order to get ahead and attain his big dream of being able to expand his business soon and to have more diverse crops.

loans.use: to cover the expenses of the maintenance of his crop including irrigation and harvesting

loans.name: Benita

texts.es: La Sra. Benita es una cliente antigua de la institucion, ella sigue con la actividad de la compra y venta de sombreros, cuenta que le fue muy bien con elanterior credito ya que compro sombreros para surtir su tienda, en esta ocacion solicita tambien para la compra de sombreros por mayor ya que siempre esta surtiendo su tienda ya que ocaciones cuando hay fiesta por la zona donde tiene su tienda tiene mucha demanda, la sra. benita se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada ya que esta actividad le permite ayudar a los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Benita is a long-term client of the organization. She is still buying and selling hats. She says her previous loan went really well because she bought hats to supply her shop. This time, too, she is requesting a loan to buy wholesale hats so she can stock her shop for regional festivals and other special occasions when demand goes up. Benita is very happy for the opportunity her work gives her to help with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy wholesale hats.

loans.name: Emerlinda

texts.en:
Emerlinda is 48 years old and separated. She is from Villalin, Panaon. She has five grown children. She provides pedicure and manicure services. She has been in this work for three years and earns 2,000 PHP a month. 

This year, Emerlinda joined GDMPC. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase cosmetics such as nail polish. She hopes for her business to expand and dreams of putting up a parlor.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics such as nail polish.

loans.name: Izkra

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa,la socia vende pantalones,casacas,blusas y polos,la socia vende en forma independiente llevando a diferentes lugares como amigos,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene en este negocio 4 años y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pantalones,blusas y polos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower continues her business of selling clothes. She sells trousers, jackets, blouses, and pullover shirts. She works independently by traveling to different places in order to sell to her friends.

The borrower works from 8:00 A.M. to 4:00 P.M. She has been in business for four years and has done very well. Her dream is to open a shop where she can sell clothes. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy trousers, blouses, and pullover shirts.

She is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy trousers, blouses, and pullover shirts.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es: El Sr. Marcelino es cliente antiguo  desde  el año 2009, esta casado con la se señora Olga la cual  también tiene un negocio  es comerciante que viaja  a otro departamento a comprar su mercaderia, El Sr. Marcelino sigue con la misma actividad de la venta de ropa de segunda mano, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior credito que lo utilizo en la compra de chamarras, en esta ocacion soicita el credito para la compra de ropa por fardo de segunda mano, el Sr. Marcelino se siente feliz por la oprtunidad brindada ya que esta actividad le permite mantener a su familia.
texts.en: Marcelino has been a borrower since 2009. He is married to Olga, who also has a business. He is a merchant who travels to another department to buy his merchandise. Marcelino continues with the same business of selling secondhand clothing. He says he did well with the previous loan, which he used to buy jackets. This time, he is asking for the loan to buy bales of secondhand clothing. Marcelino is happy for the opportunity provided, since this work lets him support his family.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials needed to make wedding gowns.

loans.name: Mercedes Pilar

texts.es: Mercedes es una señora muy alegre y trabajadora, ella posee más de 10 años trabajando en la elaboración de almuerzos, lo que se ha convertido en la forma de ganarse la vida y salir adelante. Ella vive junto a su compañero de vida y un hijo que se dedica a estudiar; Mercedes tiene su negocio en un lugar de mucha afluencia de personas  por lo que sus ventas son muy estables y cuenta con clientes fijos que consumen sus alimentos a diario. Ella solicita un préstamo  a INTEGRAL, para contar con la ayuda necesaria para comprar: carnes, verduras, granos básicos y bebidas para elaborar mayor cantidad de comida y de este modo incrementar en gran manera sus ventas lo cual es su deseo principal.
texts.en: Mercedes is a very happy and hardworking woman. For more than 10 years she has been making lunches, which has become a way for her to earn her living and move forward. She lives with her partner and one son, who is a student. Mercedes has her business in a very busy place, so her sales are very stable, and she has regular customers who eat her food every day. She is asking INTEGRAL for a loan in order to have the necessary help to buy meat, vegetables, staple grains, and drinks in order to make a larger quantity of food and in this way greatly increase her sales, which is her main desire.

loans.use: to purchase meat, vegetables, staple grains, and drinks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Idriz

texts.en:
Idriz, thirty-nine years old, is married and has three children between the ages of one and five years old. He works on a farm, earning a very low salary, and his wife is a housewife who stays at home to care for the home and the children. 

Idriz has always wanted to have his own small farm, but he could not. Now he is requesting a loan in order to start a small stable and buy a cow. This loan will help him to cut family expenses, such as those for milk and other dairy products. In the future, he hopes to expand his farm. 

His goal is to give his children a better education. Idriz wants to thank all Kiva lenders for their support!

loans.use: to start a small stable and buy a cow.

loans.name: Eddy

texts.en: Eddy is a thirty-nine-year-old married woman with four children, living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been working in a palm oil business for twelve years and works eight hours a day. She also has rental houses as another source of income. Like most good mothers, Eddy dreams of educating her children to the university level and seeing them get good jobs. Her business dream is to own a housing estate. Eddy intends to use the money to buy palm oil to sell.

loans.use: to pay for palm oil to sell.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a 55-year-old business man. He is married to Faith who is also into business. They are blessed with five children. He has been selling shoes for the past twenty years with monthly income of KES 8,000, which he uses to support his family. 

He is applying for his first loan term from KADET LTD after being introduced to the organization by KADET staff. Paul will use the loan to buy more stock of shoes for resale during this coming high season. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to expand his business and improve the family’s living standard.

loans.use: to buy more stock of shoes for resale.

loans.name: Gevorg

texts.en: Gevorg is a proactive young entrepreneur who lives in Yerevan. He runs a little shop. Gevorg wants to increase his stock variety. With the requested amount, he will buy food, which will allow him to increase the store's sales. Gevorg lives with his wife, three-year-old son, and mother. He is the only breadwinner in the family and the business income is vital for him to ensure a prosperous life for his family.

loans.use: to buy food for his store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 49-year-old business lady. She is married to Francis, a business man. They are blessed with four children. She has been distributing milk for the past five years with a monthly income of KES 10,500, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her second loan term from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan successfully. Mary will use the new loan to buy a dairy cow. 

With the anticipated profits from the business, Mary will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to buy a fridge for storing milk and to improve the family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Jose Belarmino

texts.es: José es un joven trabajador quien se esfuerza por salir adelante, él vive solo y se dedica a la agricultura de maíz y frijoles, así mismo mientras espera que la cosecha este lista para vender, trabaja también en su propia tienda de productos de primera necesidad la cual esta ubicada en su casa de habitación, con lo que él puede contar con todo lo necesario para sostenerse. José solicita un préstamo para poder comprar: golosinas, bebidas y aceites, los cuales son de los productos que más demanda poseen en el lugar, por lo que serán de gran ayuda para mejorar sus ingresos y de este modo contar con una vida mejor.
texts.en:
José is a young worker who makes an effort to come out ahead. He lives alone and works in the agriculture of corn and beans. Moreover, while waiting for the harvest to be ready to sell, he also works in his own store of items of primary necessity which is located in his home, with which he can count on everything necessary to support himself.

José is applying for a loan to be able to buy: sweets, beverages, and oils, which are the products that are the most in-demand items in his place. They will be a great help to improve his income and thus count on a better life.

loans.use: to buy candy, beverages, and oils.

loans.name: Noemi Marineli

texts.es: Noemí de 41 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres niños menores de edad y quienes dependen por completo de ella. Noemí trabaja confeccionando ropa para mujeres y niños, así mismo elabora uniformes para empleados y estudiantes, y realiza manteles, cortinas y todo lo que sus clientes lo soliciten. Ella es muy responsable y siempre entregan los pedidos a tiempo, lo que le ha ayudado a contar con muy buenas referencias y clientes. Noemí trabaja muy duro para sostener su hogar, y desea mejorar su negocio contando con mayor materia prima para elaborar más prendas de vestir, incluso que no sean con pedido previos para tener a la venta. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL y de este modo contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en su negocio.
texts.en: Noemí, 41 years old, is a single mother of three young children who depend on her completely. Noemí works making clothing for women and children. She also makes employee and student uniforms and tablecloths, curtains, and everything her customers ask her for. She is very responsible and always delivers orders on time, which has helped her to have very good references and customers. Noemí works very hard in order to support her household, and she wants to improve her business with more raw material to make clothing, even clothing that was not previously ordered, in order to sell it. This is why she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan, and in this way she will have the money necessary to invest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw material to make clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en:
Pauline is a 46-year-old mixed crop farmer. She is married to John, a business man. They are blessed with three children. She has been in the farming business for the past ten years with a monthly income of KES 12,000, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan term with KADET LTD after being introduced to it by a KADET staff member. Pauline will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm. 

With the anticipated profits from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are for her farm to produce and to improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials needed to make ladies accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: La Libertad 2 Group

texts.es:
